list_of_reviews.review_title: Potential criminal enterprise - extreme negligence at best
list_of_reviews.review: I have had a kraken account for years and all was fine, till some weeks ago a verification request came up. I have sent all required documents various times, got in contact with them and was told everything was fine and to wait. My account is completely legal, the funds are of transparent origin, all my paperwork is in order and I have complied every step of the way. Nevertheless, all of a sudden my access to the account and the funds has been cut off. I have no idea if kraken has illegally appropriated my funds or what is going on. Their support desk is completely unresponsive, complaints are not taken serious at all, in most cases not even answered. If you have an account there, close it, take your money and run. I regret deeply entrusting them with my money, big mistake

list_of_reviews.review_title: I opened an account which was promptly terminated without explanation by Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I opened an account.  Submitted my proof of residence.  Deposited a small amount of money. Within a week I receive a notice that my account is being closed with no explanation "due to security reasons".   My mailing address is a PO Box in Massachusetts.  I submitted my electric bill as proof of address.  Duh, the mailing address on my mail is to the PO Box so of course proof shows the PO Box.   License shows physical address.  So I am not sure why the account was closed.  I was told to withdraw my initial deposited funds.  Money was returned.  Seems to me this is a "business" that does not want peoples business.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken is a crock of s h i t
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken is a crock of s h i t. My deposit was flagged as suspicious by the bank and when I queried this with Kraken I got an email informing me my account will be closed and I can’t open another account.No explanation, no reason.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken canceled my account after I made…
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken canceled my account after I made a test deposit to verify deposit. Now they won't refund my balance or give me a reason for closing the account. As far as I know, I didn't violate any of the KYC requirements. For me Kraken was a really bad choice. Use at your own risk.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Had some elicit transactions in my bank…
list_of_reviews.review: Had some elicit transactions in my bank account with Kraken as a source of funds which had been transfered.  Was able to log into Kraken and noticed 1/2 bogus transactions.  Reported problem to them and have since emailed and called numerous times.  Account has been closed leaving me with no recourse other than waiting. They did send emails showing they had voided the transactions, but after almost a month, still cannot log in.

I would like to confirm every bad review you read about Kraken.  Terrible customer service.  They will close your account without any attempt to remedy the alleged problem.  Apparently I was very lucky that I had not been able to complete any purchases before they did this to me.

I don't know where I should even start. The customer experience cannot get worse than this. It's a straight robbery. I deposited with Interac transfer a few days ago 3000 CAD into my Kraken account and received confirmation from both the bank and Interac that the money was collected. Ticket number #12566698. Reaching out to the live chat wasn't a fruitful idea - they have made me wait for 6 hours a few times and never got a response. The only response was an auto-reply saying I would receive an email which I never did! My bank cannot recall the transfer so my money went to nowhere! Happy Halving Day (for Kraken, not investors)!Beware of this!

Terrible service. My ticket has been pending for months and there is no other follow up than some standard templates im being sent. I cannot log into my account because their verification system does not allow me to upload the right documents. Kraken is not following up correctly. The moment I can log in again I will take all my money and leave Kraken. This is ridiculous.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wish I could leave a zero star
list_of_reviews.review: I wish I could leave a zero stars for support! I opened an account so that I could offramp some XRP. I can understand that my initial proof of address was rejected as part of the verification, but it has been a nightmare ever since I tried to correct that. Support reached out asking for this proof, which I gave. I have been ghosted for the past two weeks, and whenever I reach out to live support (which takes 3 hours) I am told the ticket is still open.I have asked to close the account because I found an alternative, and the support also says I should email my request to the same person who is ghosting me. It seems creating an account works like clockwork, but deleting one is practically impossible.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I made a fair profit using Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I made a fair profit using Kraken. I did buy and stake Bitcoin at $40,000, along with whatever ETH, SOL, and ADA were priced at the time (January 2024).I have sold Bitcoin around $60,000 (April 2024). The other assets went up roughly the same, so I made about 50% profit.There are alot of transanction fees and I didn't realise the "earn" function was sent to third parties for their profit. But overall I made a profit and got my money back, so am satisfied.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid Kraken at all costs - Terrible experience
list_of_reviews.review: I would strongly advise against using Kraken. On April 4th, 2024, I transferred a significant amount of money into my Kraken account. As of today, the funds are still being held by the platform. I have reached out to their support team multiple times, and all they have said is that they have a high volume of requests and that they have escalated my issue to a specialized team.This is completely unacceptable. It feels like outright fraud to hold onto customers' money indefinitely with no resolution in sight. There are much better cryptocurrency exchanges out there that provide reliable service and timely transactions. Do yourself a favor and avoid Kraken - it's just not worth the headache and potential loss of your hard-earned money. Terrible experience overall.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Excellent and helpful and efficient support service
list_of_reviews.review: I have had almost immediate help that was very efficient from Kraken support on several occasions the last time was 26th March Cant understand why people are complaining Amongst the lowest fees too. Much better functionality than Coinbase

list_of_reviews.review_title: My pending withdawal was on hold for a…
list_of_reviews.review: My pending withdawal was on hold for a month now. I emailed 10 times to kraken support for any update on my withdrawal. They just keep ignoring my email and never email me back. Terrible customer support seriously

This platform is quite hostile to users. 1.Lost of hidden behind the scene messy doings. 2.Very high fees on everything, for nothing. 3.They like to hold your account hostage often and at all the worst possible times. I have experienced blocks and locks and all manner of interference and corresponding loses.4.Every single support requests results on very lengthy and tech complex 'KYC' audits and compliances 'requests' instead of fixing anything.Their KYC's is 'requested' very very often, not once, but repeatedly anytime they are contacted for support or for anything else regardless of having already gone through their whole system of supposed KYC. 5. Support, contacts and queries are passed along from 'agent's to 'agent's and never answered. Then the whole thing repeats again.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Blocked my account with all my money
list_of_reviews.review: Blocked my account with all my money! Support doesn't answer anything.

Terrible.Shut my account down for no reason - no explanation given.Had to cash out my crypto to fiat and transfer to bank account (not just transfer to another wallet or exchange).Just given 72hrs to do it, and some of my crypto was on a dip, so cashing out cost me, then it'll cost me again to buy it back.Terrible lack of customer service, they just said:Unfortunately, we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes, we cannot disclose the reason for this action.Please note that you still have a balance on your Kraken account. Therefore, we request that you complete the following actions within the next 72 hours (from the time and date of this message):• Convert your crypto to cash and withdraw your remaining balance to a bank account in your own name.• Export all your trade and ledger history as we will be unable to provide it to you later.Deposit services have already been disabled for your account. After the 72 hours have passed, your account will be closed.Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account. We may reach out to you if we require additional documentation.We appreciate your understanding.That's what they said, and looking at forums it's happening to a lot of people who are mystified as to why.A real shame, as the exchange is functionally good, but as for customer service, totally diabolical.STEER CLEAR

list_of_reviews.review_title: My transfer from my Kraken Spot account…
list_of_reviews.review: My transfer from my Kraken Spot account to the Kraken Future account has been pending for 3 days. Support ticket was created after 30 minutes whereafter a customer service responded that he would create a support ticket for me and that I would be contacted on email, which no one has done. So disappointing that such a large company cannot manage transfers between my own account's portfolios... Public ID: AA44 N84G IU4P UCEQ

list_of_reviews.review_title: KRAKEN WILL REPLY ONCE BUT WILL NOT HELP YOU
list_of_reviews.review: April 18, 2024 UPDATEA phone appointment finally account verified had 7000.00 now 1555.00 some idiot moves our money to ETH Kraken steals your money and will not give you access to your account on line I have been trying to get to my account since March 15,2024 and kraken will not assist and a police report has been filed and still nothing as far as I am concerned kraken has stolen $7000.00 so don’t use them unless you like giving your money away.also one star is giving them too much credit more like zero stars!! This company of course will reply to this and do nothing they do not help you so please so not use this company they will take your funds and they do not help you get back into your account!! Over 30 days and they did nothing but keep my 7000.00 and I am going to report them to anyone and everyone who will listen because I have proof and this is my account my funds and they will not helping me so please be very careful and never believe anyone who calls you too many scammers out there and as far as I am concerned kraken is a scam. And they never answer there phones and when you do leave your number for them to call back they never do!!!

I decided to open an account on Kraken and invest some of my savings in Bitcoin. After providing all the required information, I received confirmation of my account setup within just a few minutes. Additionally, they granted me Intermediate status. On the same day, I transferred $5,000 (their bank took its commission) and bought 0.06799729 BTC. Kraken took their fee plus they probably converted dollars into euros at a rate known only to them. Nevertheless, I was satisfied - I invested almost 5000 dollars in Bitcoin, now it was just a matter of waiting calmly for the exchange rate to rise. I was mistaken. On next day, I received an email from Kraken with information that my account will be closed. They gave me 72 hours to sell the BTC and withdraw the money. They provided no reason for such a decision! They wrote: "For security purposes, we cannot disclose the reason for this action"It is worth noting that these 72 hours fell on Saturday and Sunday, furthermore, it was Easter holidays.I sold the BTC I owned (they charged another fee) and transferred the money to my dollar account (another exchange). As a result I lost several hundred dollars. So avoid!

Photo id is terrible.  I get it that the FEDs are overreaching cause they're envious of money being made but Kraken is playing into their hand by making impossible to access my account, so I'm going to close my account after some 8 years.

i have fully verified my account and have transferred 2000 eur to my kraken account from my bank, after when kraken received my money they closed my account with out any reason and explanation what happen. I asked them to return my money but they want me to go to police and to do report.looks like total SCAM. dont invest into kraken ever!My ticket number is 12657316
Quite better than other Platforms. I have problems investing from Bank. With Kraken was extremely quick. Also my issue with Support was handle pretty fast.My experience is positive here.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have used many different crypto…
list_of_reviews.review: I have used many different crypto exchanges the last 9 years. Kraken is the best in my estimation. The people behind it are trustworthy honourable people. Their fees are very reasonable. The interface is quite use friendly and works well. I felt obliged to write this review after I saw all the bad reviews..

Been using for about a month. Deposits always go missing and you have to ask the customer support for it to be credited to your account.Made a large deposit today, again it didn't show up in my account so I asked customer support. After a while they told me they were closing my account for 'security reasons' and they would return my money sometime in the future???So why wasn't I informed my account was closed before I made a deposit? I could still login prior to doing so.Absolutely disgraceful. No wonder they have such shockingly poor reviews here. So many better exchanges out there to go with. Thieves.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wish I read these reviews before using Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I honestly wish I read the reviews about Kraken before using it.I created a Kraken account a few months ago and had no issues with KYC. I only had a few hundred dollars of crypto in my and very rarely used my account. All of a sudden I got an email saying my account is being closed and I nearly lost my crypto.Kraken refuses to give any reason for the closure. They say it's for security reasons but we all know it's an excuse.The support is also terrible and it's nearly impossible to reach support.I did some research and it seems this is common.DO NOT USE KRAKEN

list_of_reviews.review_title: Closed my account with no warning for…
list_of_reviews.review: Closed my account with no warning for no reason.  Thankfully i never had anything in it. Their 'support' is clearly automated with a persons name on it to make it seem more real. Despite not even replying to my query 5 days later they send me a how did we do survey. Truly believe they are just trolling at this point. It appears they are doing this left right and centre taking peoples money in the process. Feel sorry for anyone who had money in there. Cowboys
They just locked my account without reason. I sent them already countless emails but customer support doesn't care. Avoid at all costs!!!

i have fully verified my account and have transferred 2000 eur to my kraken account from my bank, after when kraken received my money they closed my account with out any reason and explanation what happen. I asked them to return my money but they want me to go to police and to do report.looks like total SCAM. dont invest into kraken ever!My ticket number is 12657316

I've been asked to verify my identity twice this year already. No issues the first time. Second time their verification process didn't work correctly due to an issue with the site using your camera. I emailed support. They got back days after telling me they knew they were having this issue. Never got back again even though I emailed them several times. Days later I tried again and it worked. A week ago I was asked to send a proof of address since I had moved. Still waiting...

list_of_reviews.review_title: This is how they treat long-time customers
list_of_reviews.review: AA87 N84G 6RRF BA7I Being a loyal user of Kraken since November 2021, I was using Kraken on a weekly basis, I have a fully verified account and suddenly I get an email that I needed to send in new documents because of a change in their policies and that I had to do this within 30 days. I complied immediately and sent all the documents they want. Afterwards I received a deposit of 1060 USDT, which first got stuck on confirming for a full day, and now all of a sudden is put ON HOLD. This money was sent for my newborn son and they are not crediting this to my account. Only response is they are working 24/7/365 and will receive an update soon as they are reviewing my account. This is no way to treat your customers who have used your platform for years on end! How long can it take to check a bank statement and a face picture??? Still waiting on response on Ticket # 12686601Update: while promising to put me on the front of the line, I have sent mails, talked to their support but they are completely ignoring me. People DO NOT TAKE THE RISK! USE DIFFERENT EXCHANGES!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken Support team are trying to lose customers
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken support agents reply with incorrect information in their responses. Recently they have required customers to confirm their identity ( KYC ) and their using "persona" to upload your ID and video selfie. Well, after doing all the necessary steps, it still did not recognise my documents and I was locked out of my account. Upon contacting Kraken support, the first support person says their "devs" are working on it. No reply for 5 days after I write back telling them to unlock my account. Then I'm told by another support person that the selfie was not recognised and can I do it again. Now "person" asks for my ID again, which I already uploaded and for some reson it doesn't recognise my ID and can't take the pic. Then I contact customer support again for the 4th time and the latest person tells me to try on another device and that my address has changed. IT HAS NOT! Been living in the same address for over 5 years. What is going on with Kraken support members? Are they just copy and pastiing replies and not reading what the customer is asking? list_of_reviews.review_title: I opened an account which was promptly terminated without explanation by Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I opened an account.  Submitted my proof of residence.  Deposited a small amount of money. Within a week I receive a notice that my account is being closed with no explanation "due to security reasons".   My mailing address is a PO Box in Massachusetts.  I submitted my electric bill as proof of address.  Duh, the mailing address on my mail is to the PO Box so of course proof shows the PO Box.   License shows physical address.  So I am not sure why the account was closed.  I was told to withdraw my initial deposited funds.  Money was returned.  Seems to me this is a "business" that does not want peoples business. Ticket # 12602633

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken is a crock of s h i t

list_of_reviews.review_title: Potential criminal enterprise - extreme negligence at best
list_of_reviews.review: I have had a kraken account for years and all was fine, till some weeks ago a verification request came up. I have sent all required documents various times, got in contact with them and was told everything was fine and to wait. My account is completely legal, the funds are of transparent origin, all my paperwork is in order and I have complied every step of the way. Nevertheless, all of a sudden my access to the account and the funds has been cut off. I have no idea if kraken has illegally appropriated my funds or what is going on. Their support desk is completely unresponsive, complaints are not taken serious at all, in most cases not even answered. If you have an account there, close it, take your money and run. The moment I can log in again I will take all my money and leave Kraken. This is ridiculous.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid Kraken at all costs - Terrible experience

list_of_reviews.review_title: I was referred to Kraken by a very good…
list_of_reviews.review: I was referred to Kraken by a very good trader. Initially I transferred the funds via my Bank (Twice) and had no issues. Then I logged my card so that I can purchase it through my card which I did. Money was in my Kraken account immediately. I went to transfer like before (Twice) but they only transferred $45 and the rest stayed in Kraken account. After the week end was over, I emailed them as to why the rest of funds are not transferred?. Reply was for SECURITY REASONS they wanted me to withdraw the amount back to my Bank and close my account. Asked WHAT WAS THE SECURITY REASON and they would not divulge any information. It took me 3 times and six days to finally activate the transfer. Funds are not in my account as yet let’s hope they are by Thursday.I am putting in a complain to FCA regarding this as I believe Kraken owes me the answer of that SECURITY REASON is. Reading some reviews here I see quite a lot have suffered their SECURITY REASON Pallava.

I opened an account with Kraken on 8 Apr 2024. For unknown reason, it was closed on the next day before I even had a chance to use it and was informed that I will not be allowed to open another one. No explanation given due to their “security” reason. Clearly, the only crime I have committed was to open an account with them. The worst was yet to come. Under such circumstance, one would assume that it is normal for a crypto exchange to refund a deposit immediately. Instead, I was forced to remain persistent with my follow ups nearly every day for more than five weeks before they decided to pay me back!  Isn’t it odd that while deposits are credited within one day, when it comes to payment or withdrawal, they are really good in dragging their feet! Although the Support team was helpful, they were restricted within their own boundary. By the way, don’t bother writing to the new CEO for help because he still has not learnt the fundamental manners of replying to his email yet. By comparison, other providers like Binance, ByBit and Coinbase may charge marginally higher fee but they are, by far, more professional than Kraken. After such an appalling experience, do you think I will recommend anyone to open an account with Kraken? Not a chance! Stay clear of this mob! They operate like scammers!

list_of_reviews.review: They locked me out. Because all the contact page nonsense, just isn't getting the job done.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I was referred to Kraken by a very good…
list_of_reviews.review: I was referred to Kraken by a very good trader. Initially I transferred the funds via my Bank (Twice) and had no issues. Then I logged my card so that I can purchase it through my card which I did. Money was in my Kraken account immediately. I went to transfer like before (Twice) but they only transferred $45 and the rest stayed in Kraken account. After the week end was over, I emailed them as to why the rest of funds are not transferred?. Reply was for SECURITY REASONS they wanted me to withdraw the amount back to my Bank and close my account. Asked WHAT WAS THE SECURITY REASON and they would not divulge any information. It took me 3 times and six days to finally activate the transfer. Funds are not in my account as yet let’s hope they are by Thursday.I am putting in a complain to FCA regarding this as I believe Kraken owes me the answer of that SECURITY REASON is. Reading some reviews here I see quite a lot have suffered their SECURITY REASON Pallava.

I opened an account with Kraken on 8 Apr 2024. For unknown reason, it was closed on the next day before I even had a chance to use it and was informed that I will not be allowed to open another one. No explanation given due to their “security” reason. Clearly, the only crime I have committed was to open an account with them. The worst was yet to come. Under such circumstance, one would assume that it is normal for a crypto exchange to refund a deposit immediately. Instead, I was forced to remain persistent with my follow ups nearly every day for more than five weeks before they decided to pay me back!  Isn’t it odd that while deposits are credited within one day, when it comes to payment or withdrawal, they are really good in dragging their feet! Although the Support team was helpful, they were restricted within their own boundary. By the way, don’t bother writing to the new CEO for help because he still has not learnt the fundamental manners of replying to his email yet. By comparison, other providers like Binance, ByBit and Coinbase may charge marginally higher fee but they are, by far, more professional than Kraken. After such an appalling experience, do you think I will recommend anyone to open an account with Kraken? Not a chance! Stay clear of this mob! They operate like scammers!

I have a problem with a deposit, opened a ticket and after an initial response, the team hasn't given me any update since 2 months. I'm still waiting for my money. Ticket # 12180478EDIT: Thanks for your answer. I hope it'll be resolved soon.

list_of_reviews.review_title: My account was used in a scam
list_of_reviews.review: My account was used in a scam.  While Kraken was happy to let the scammer's access my account, they then failed to freeze it when requested, allowing the scammers to drain my funds.  They then emailed me saying they were closing my account, banning me from the site. They have refused to answer my questions, discuss the event with me or even tell me who their overseeing body is so that I can make a complaint.  I have been treated like a criminal by them and they won't take to me.Ticket # 12722716

Been using for about a month. Deposits always go missing and you have to ask the customer support for it to be credited to your account.Made a large deposit today, again it didn't show up in my account so I asked customer support. After a while they told me they were closing my account for 'security reasons' and they would return my money sometime in the future???So why wasn't I informed my account was closed before I made a deposit? I could still login prior to doing so.Absolutely disgraceful. No wonder they have such shockingly poor reviews here. So many better exchanges out there to go with. Thieves.

Their fees are very reasonable. The interface is quite use friendly and works well. I felt obliged to write this review after I saw all the bad reviews..

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wish I read these reviews before using Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I honestly wish I read the reviews about Kraken before using it.I created a Kraken account a few months ago and had no issues with KYC. I only had a few hundred dollars of crypto in my and very rarely used my account. All of a sudden I got an email saying my account is being closed and I nearly lost my crypto.Kraken refuses to give any reason for the closure. They say it's for security reasons but we all know it's an excuse.The support is also terrible and it's nearly impossible to reach support.I did some research and it seems this is common.DO NOT USE KRAKEN

Truly believe they are just trolling at this point. It appears they are doing this left right and centre taking peoples money in the process. Feel sorry for anyone who had money in there. Cowboys

Transferred Sepa Instanta,6676 Euros,money came on krak,decided to go to trade,immediately the money is blocked,funds are clean,not stolen,sent from my accounts everything is fine.AA41 N84G ZRZM TOVY my ID.reference number Ticket # 12724622Emails are not answered for 24 hours and more.In chat they say they can't solve anything.They do not even say what is the reason for such a delay and so on.Just blocking any operationsAll degrees of verification passed, 2FA and other everywhere connected, all done according to the limits there are no problems at all.Only money came to the exchange, instantly blocked.......Support in e-mail (wait, wait, wait, wait no specifics)P.S.AddendumI received a message that my account was closed without cause and denied service.Requested to withdraw funds to the account from which I sent them the money. The request was accepted for processing.In 10 minutes I submitted a request for the same transaction from another exchange (I will not advertise anything here) from the 2nd exchange money has long come.What does Kraken do? Right, sends a message that my transfer (Sepa Instanta) is still in processing (although their website says that these transfers are carried out instantly) But in my case instantly I only have a nervous breakdown, the transaction itself has been in processing for half a day.I am sure that by the evening they will come up with a reason why the transaction will be blocked or again I will have to wait several days and answer my melas for several hours.
They just locked my account without reason. I sent them already countless emails but customer support doesn't care. Avoid at all costs!!!

I've been asked to verify my identity twice this year already. No issues the first time. Second time their verification process didn't work correctly due to an issue with the site using your camera. I emailed support. They got back days after telling me they knew they were having this issue. Never got back again even though I emailed them several times. Days later I tried again and it worked. A week ago I was asked to send a proof of address since I had moved. Still waiting...Ticket # 12519718Have emailed support several times and haven't received anu response. Kraken is a joke.
Quite better than other Platforms. I have problems investing from Bank. With Kraken was extremely quick. Also my issue with Support was handle pretty fast.My experience is positive here.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken Support team are trying to lose customers
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken support agents reply with incorrect information in their responses. Recently they have required customers to confirm their identity ( KYC ) and their using "persona" to upload your ID and video selfie. Well, after doing all the necessary steps, it still did not recognise my documents and I was locked out of my account. Upon contacting Kraken support, the first support person says their "devs" are working on it. No reply for 5 days after I write back telling them to unlock my account. Then I'm told by another support person that the selfie was not recognised and can I do it again. Now "person" asks for my ID again, which I already uploaded and for some reson it doesn't recognise my ID and can't take the pic. Then I contact customer support again for the 4th time and the latest person tells me to try on another device and that my address has changed. IT HAS NOT! Been living in the same address for over 5 years. What is going on with Kraken support members? Are they just copy and pastiing replies and not reading what the customer is asking? Are they trying to lose customers, because if they are, they are doing a great job at it! AND, don't even try to call them... there is no answer. Phone lines are closed!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken canceled my account after I made…

As far as I know, I didn't violate any of the KYC requirements. For me Kraken was a really bad choice. Use at your own risk.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Potential criminal enterprise - extreme negligence at best
list_of_reviews.review: I have had a kraken account for years and all was fine, till some weeks ago a verification request came up. I have sent all required documents various times, got in contact with them and was told everything was fine and to wait. My account is completely legal, the funds are of transparent origin, all my paperwork is in order and I have complied every step of the way. Nevertheless, all of a sudden my access to the account and the funds has been cut off. I have no idea if kraken has illegally appropriated my funds or what is going on. Their support desk is completely unresponsive, complaints are not taken serious at all, in most cases not even answered. If you have an account there, close it, take your money and run. I regret deeply entrusting them with my money, big mistake

list_of_reviews.review_title: I placed an scheduled order to buy…
list_of_reviews.review: I placed a scheduled order to buy Bitcoin worth £3,500 when 1 Bitcoin fell to £52,314, to be paid with my account balance in Pound Sterling on May 20th. This morning, on May 21st, it fell to £51,944. When I talked with support, they said that my order failed due to adverse market conditions. When I asked for an explanation, they basically said that they are POOR and couldn't complete my order. STAY AWAY!!!

Bought Crypto in April using bank account . In May I raised a query with the support team with regards to withdrawals. Support team raised a ticket and email to my inbox. The next moment I received an email from support team as below,   Wray (Kraken Support)May 17, 2024, 07:52 PDTHello Investor, Unfortunately we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes we cannot disclose the reason for this action. Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account and that our live chat and phone support channels will not be able to provide assistance regarding this matter. We appreciate your understanding.Your request (number 12790350) is currently marked in our system as ‘Solved’, which means we think your issue has already been resolved.To protect your personal information, we ask that you delete this email thread.Ticket # 12790350

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have used many different crypto…
list_of_reviews.review: I have used many different crypto exchanges the last 9 years. Kraken is the best in my estimation. The people behind it are trustworthy honourable people. Their fees are very reasonable. The interface is quite use friendly and works well. I felt obliged to write this review after I saw all the bad reviews..

list_of_reviews.review_title: I was referred to Kraken by a very good…
list_of_reviews.review: I was referred to Kraken by a very good trader. Initially I transferred the funds via my Bank (Twice) and had no issues. Then I logged my card so that I can purchase it through my card which I did. Money was in my Kraken account immediately. I went to transfer like before (Twice) but they only transferred $45 and the rest stayed in Kraken account. After the week end was over, I emailed them as to why the rest of funds are not transferred?. Reply was for SECURITY REASONS they wanted me to withdraw the amount back to my Bank and close my account. Asked WHAT WAS THE SECURITY REASON and they would not divulge any information. It took me 3 times and six days to finally activate the transfer. Funds are not in my account as yet let’s hope they are by Thursday.I am putting in a complain to FCA regarding this as I believe Kraken owes me the answer of that SECURITY REASON is. Reading some reviews here I see quite a lot have suffered their SECURITY REASON Pallava.

I have a problem with a deposit, opened a ticket and after an initial response, the team hasn't given me any update since 2 months. I'm still waiting for my money. Ticket # 12180478EDIT: Thanks for your answer. I hope it'll be resolved soon.

I opened an account with Kraken on 8 Apr 2024. For unknown reason, it was closed on the next day before I even had a chance to use it and was informed that I will not be allowed to open another one. No explanation given due to their “security” reason. Clearly, the only crime I have committed was to open an account with them. The worst was yet to come. Under such circumstance, one would assume that it is normal for a crypto exchange to refund a deposit immediately. Instead, I was forced to remain persistent with my follow ups nearly every day for more than five weeks before they decided to pay me back!  Isn’t it odd that while deposits are credited within one day, when it comes to payment or withdrawal, they are really good in dragging their feet! Although the Support team was helpful, they were restricted within their own boundary. By the way, don’t bother writing to the new CEO for help because he still has not learnt the fundamental manners of replying to his email yet. By comparison, other providers like Binance, ByBit and Coinbase may charge marginally higher fee but they are, by far, more professional than Kraken. After such an appalling experience, do you think I will recommend anyone to open an account with Kraken? Not a chance! Stay clear of this mob! They operate like scammers!

list_of_reviews.review_title: My account was used in a scam
list_of_reviews.review: My account was used in a scam.  While Kraken was happy to let the scammer's access my account, they then failed to freeze it when requested, allowing the scammers to drain my funds.  They then emailed me saying they were closing my account, banning me from the site. They have refused to answer my questions, discuss the event with me or even tell me who their overseeing body is so that I can make a complaint.  I have been treated like a criminal by them and they won't take to me.Ticket # 12722716

Been using for about a month. Deposits always go missing and you have to ask the customer support for it to be credited to your account.Made a large deposit today, again it didn't show up in my account so I asked customer support. After a while they told me they were closing my account for 'security reasons' and they would return my money sometime in the future???So why wasn't I informed my account was closed before I made a deposit? I could still login prior to doing so.Absolutely disgraceful. No wonder they have such shockingly poor reviews here. So many better exchanges out there to go with. Thieves.

They locked me out.  Reported some unauthorized transaction and that was it.  little to no response and their method of trying to contact them is such bs, that you can't report unless you're signed in, and I can't sign in.  It's easier to reset your password at the bank than with these guys.  For instance, you need a ticket number in order to fill out a form on the contact page, but right, can't get that unless you're signed in.I'm sorry but due to a computer crash some time back I don't have an account number.  And as far as public ID, all I have is my user ID which is/was taskatan2.I've submitted multiple emails, and even was able to talk to someone on the phone before that was suspended, so there must be some record of my multiple attempts to resolve this.Also, even though I did receive a couple responses from you, have never been given a "ticket number"And since you have emailed me, and you do show me as a customer, and you do have my DL Pic, how hard is it to email again, or call, me or ask for my DL pic again to prove I am who I say I am?  Because all the contact page nonsense, just isn't getting the job done.5/17   Still waiting on a response.  I've noticed a pattern here and that is, on your first complaint there is a response from Kraken sounding very sincere and forthright.  But upon updating my post wondering where is that earnest desire to make things right - crickets. I've pointed out the hysterical contradiction in acquiring a ticket number in order to contact you.  I need to be logged in to get one, but I cannot log in without one.  Insane. Eventually Trust Pilot will delete my post as they have done in the past.  I'll make another review, Kraken will again sincerely reply about their concern for my situation.  And that is that.This is my fourth update. if anybody is counting.
Quite better than other Platforms. I have problems investing from Bank. With Kraken was extremely quick. Also my issue with Support was handle pretty fast.My experience is positive here.

i have fully verified my account and have transferred 2000 eur to my kraken account from my bank, after when kraken received my money they closed my account with out any reason and explanation what happen. I asked them to return my money but they want me to go to police and to do report.looks like total SCAM. dont invest into kraken ever!My ticket number is 12657316

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wish I read these reviews before using Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I honestly wish I read the reviews about Kraken before using it.I created a Kraken account a few months ago and had no issues with KYC. I only had a few hundred dollars of crypto in my and very rarely used my account. All of a sudden I got an email saying my account is being closed and I nearly lost my crypto.Kraken refuses to give any reason for the closure. They say it's for security reasons but we all know it's an excuse.The support is also terrible and it's nearly impossible to reach support.I did some research and it seems this is common.DO NOT USE KRAKEN

list_of_reviews.review_title: Closed my account with no warning for…
list_of_reviews.review: Closed my account with no warning for no reason.  Thankfully i never had anything in it. Their 'support' is clearly automated with a persons name on it to make it seem more real. Despite not even replying to my query 5 days later they send me a how did we do survey. Truly believe they are just trolling at this point. It appears they are doing this left right and centre taking peoples money in the process. Feel sorry for anyone who had money in there. Cowboys

Transferred Sepa Instanta,6676 Euros,money came on krak,decided to go to trade,immediately the money is blocked,funds are clean,not stolen,sent from my accounts everything is fine.AA41 N84G ZRZM TOVY my ID.reference number Ticket # 12724622Emails are not answered for 24 hours and more.In chat they say they can't solve anything.They do not even say what is the reason for such a delay and so on.Just blocking any operationsAll degrees of verification passed, 2FA and other everywhere connected, all done according to the limits there are no problems at all.Only money came to the exchange, instantly blocked.......Support in e-mail (wait, wait, wait, wait no specifics)P.S.AddendumI received a message that my account was closed without cause and denied service.Requested to withdraw funds to the account from which I sent them the money. The request was accepted for processing.In 10 minutes I submitted a request for the same transaction from another exchange (I will not advertise anything here) from the 2nd exchange money has long come.What does Kraken do? Right, sends a message that my transfer (Sepa Instanta) is still in processing (although their website says that these transfers are carried out instantly) But in my case instantly I only have a nervous breakdown, the transaction itself has been in processing for half a day.I am sure that by the evening they will come up with a reason why the transaction will be blocked or again I will have to wait several days and answer my melas for several hours.

complete incompetence they dont respond to emails they blocked my account and wont give any reason and wont give me any information on the crypto acount that scamed me for 50 plus grand do not trust these people

I've been asked to verify my identity twice this year already. No issues the first time. Second time their verification process didn't work correctly due to an issue with the site using your camera. I emailed support. They got back days after telling me they knew they were having this issue. Never got back again even though I emailed them several times. Days later I tried again and it worked. A week ago I was asked to send a proof of address since I had moved. Still waiting...Ticket # 12519718Have emailed support several times and haven't received anu response. Kraken is a joke.
They just locked my account without reason. I sent them already countless emails but customer support doesn't care. Avoid at all costs!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken canceled my account after I made…
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken canceled my account after I made a test deposit to verify deposit. Now they won't refund my balance or give me a reason for closing the account. As far as I know, I didn't violate any of the KYC requirements. For me Kraken was a really bad choice. Use at your own risk.

Terrible service. My ticket has been pending for months and there is no other follow up than some standard templates im being sent. I cannot log into my account because their verification system does not allow me to upload the right documents. Kraken is not following up correctly. The moment I can log in again I will take all my money and leave Kraken. This is ridiculous.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Excellent and helpful and efficient support service
list_of_reviews.review: I have had almost immediate help that was very efficient from Kraken support on several occasions the last time was 26th March Cant understand why people are complaining Amongst the lowest fees too. Much better functionality than Coinbase

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews indicate that the platform is generally trusted by its users, who appreciate its reasonable fees and find its interface to be user-friendly, suggesting that the platform is accessible and cost-effective. However, the existence of bad reviews, although not detailed in the context provided, implies that there are some areas of dissatisfaction among users that could be addressed. The key themes identified from the posts—market stability, investor education, and platform development—suggest that the platform is perceived as a stable option in the volatile crypto market, values the education of its investors, and is actively working on expanding its capabilities through integrations and partnerships. To further enhance user satisfaction, the platform could investigate the specific issues raised in the negative reviews and consider user feedback for continuous improvement. Additionally, maintaining a focus on market stability, expanding educational resources, and continuing to develop the platform through strategic partnerships could reinforce its position in the market and address any underlying concerns reflected in the less positive feedback.

list_of_reviews.review: I should have read the reviews here before I opened an account with them. I had only made two deposits and sent USDT once. This morning, I woke up to the following message from Kraken. Stay away from these guys."Unfortunately, we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes, we cannot disclose the reason for this action." "Deposit services have already been disabled for your account. After the 72 hours have passed, your account will be closed.Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account. We may reach out to you if we require additional documentation.We appreciate your understanding.""Security Reasons" I had a fully verified account; these guys are unbelievable.

Kraken used to be good but for German users they are not recommended anymore. Their new KYC process is the worst of all exchanges and they delist the most attractive coins.Edit to Kraken's reply: You claim you want to accelerate the adoption of crypto and develop exciting new products, but what you do is you delist popular coins and disable staking of popular assets. Looks like the new Kraken starts with a big lie. Red flag!!!

Bought Crypto in April using bank account . In May I raised a query with the support team with regards to withdrawals. Support team raised a ticket and email to my inbox. The next moment I received an email from support team as below,   Wray (Kraken Support)May 17, 2024, 07:52 PDTHello Investor, Unfortunately we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes we cannot disclose the reason for this action. Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account and that our live chat and phone support channels will not be able to provide assistance regarding this matter. We appreciate your understanding.Your request (number 12790350) is currently marked in our system as ‘Solved’, which means we think your issue has already been resolved.To protect your personal information, we ask that you delete this email thread.Ticket # 12790350

Copie intégrale du message reçu une dizaine de jours après l'ouverture d'un compte chez KrakenWilliam (Kraken Support)May 17, 2024, 08:55 PDTHello *****,Unfortunately, we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes, we cannot disclose the reason for this action.Your deposit is being returned to your sending bank; this process can take several business days before the refund is credited back to your bank. Please double check your bank statement for confirmation of the return.Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account.We appreciate your understanding.Security Tips:Beware of Scams carried out via bogus online trading platforms. Never accept unsolicited investment offers made on social media or over the phone.Beware of romance or impersonation scams - A scammer may pretends to be a well known or trustworthy person and tries to get you to send them cryptocurrency.Beware of government office scams - Please beware of someone contacting you and demanding a debt or tax be paid in the form of cryptocurrency.Secure your Kraken account and digital life - It is vital for clients to take advantage of the account security tools and advice that we offer. Never share access to the account with anyone else.Regards,WilliamKraken SupportKeep your Kraken account secure with these useful tips!The Kraken Support Team will never ask for your password or to install third party software. Be aware of phishing scams and bookmark to avoid using search engines to navigate to our site.Your request (number ******) is currently marked in our system as ‘Solved’, which means we think your issue has already been resolved.If it has not yet been resolved, let us know by replying to this email.To protect your personal information, we ask that you delete this email thread.Ticket # ******

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have used many different crypto…
list_of_reviews.review: I have used many different crypto exchanges the last 9 years. Kraken is the best in my estimation. The people behind it are trustworthy honourable people. Their fees are very reasonable. The interface is quite use friendly and works well. I felt obliged to write this review after I saw all the bad reviews..

I have a problem with a deposit, opened a ticket and after an initial response, the team hasn't given me any update since 2 months. I'm still waiting for my money. Ticket # 12180478EDIT: Thanks for your answer. I hope it'll be resolved soon.

I opened an account with Kraken on 8 Apr 2024. For unknown reason, it was closed on the next day before I even had a chance to use it and was informed that I will not be allowed to open another one. No explanation given due to their “security” reason. Clearly, the only crime I have committed was to open an account with them. The worst was yet to come. Under such circumstance, one would assume that it is normal for a crypto exchange to refund a deposit immediately. Instead, I was forced to remain persistent with my follow ups nearly every day for more than five weeks before they decided to pay me back!  Isn’t it odd that while deposits are credited within one day, when it comes to payment or withdrawal, they are really good in dragging their feet! Although the Support team was helpful, they were restricted within their own boundary. By the way, don’t bother writing to the new CEO for help because he still has not learnt the fundamental manners of replying to his email yet. By comparison, other providers like Binance, ByBit and Coinbase may charge marginally higher fee but they are, by far, more professional than Kraken. After such an appalling experience, do you think I will recommend anyone to open an account with Kraken? Not a chance! Stay clear of this mob! They operate like scammers!

list_of_reviews.review_title: My account was used in a scam
list_of_reviews.review: My account was used in a scam.  While Kraken was happy to let the scammer's access my account, they then failed to freeze it when requested, allowing the scammers to drain my funds.  They then emailed me saying they were closing my account, banning me from the site. They have refused to answer my questions, discuss the event with me or even tell me who their overseeing body is so that I can make a complaint.  I have been treated like a criminal by them and they won't take to me.Ticket # 12722716
Quite better than other Platforms. I have problems investing from Bank. With Kraken was extremely quick. Also my issue with Support was handle pretty fast.My experience is positive here.

Been using for about a month. Deposits always go missing and you have to ask the customer support for it to be credited to your account.Made a large deposit today, again it didn't show up in my account so I asked customer support. After a while they told me they were closing my account for 'security reasons' and they would return my money sometime in the future???So why wasn't I informed my account was closed before I made a deposit? I could still login prior to doing so.Absolutely disgraceful. No wonder they have such shockingly poor reviews here. So many better exchanges out there to go with. Thieves.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I was referred to Kraken by a very good…
list_of_reviews.review: I was referred to Kraken by a very good trader. Initially I transferred the funds via my Bank (Twice) and had no issues. Then I logged my card so that I can purchase it through my card which I did. Money was in my Kraken account immediately. I went to transfer like before (Twice) but they only transferred $45 and the rest stayed in Kraken account. After the week end was over, I emailed them as to why the rest of funds are not transferred?. Reply was for SECURITY REASONS they wanted me to withdraw the amount back to my Bank and close my account. Asked WHAT WAS THE SECURITY REASON and they would not divulge any information. It took me 3 times and six days to finally activate the transfer. Funds are not in my account as yet let’s hope they are by Thursday.I am putting in a complain to FCA regarding this as I believe Kraken owes me the answer of that SECURITY REASON is. Reading some reviews here I see quite a lot have suffered their SECURITY REASON Pallava.24/05/24Kraken is asking for ticket number but they should look to their support considering they have my name.Furthermore I have withdrawn my money and arguing with them to refund charges I incurred in transferring the funds back into my bank on the basis that they instigate to close my account without giving any valid reason. Security Reason is not a valid reason. STRONGLY ADVISE NOT TO USE THIS COMPANY

They locked me out.  Reported some unauthorized transaction and that was it.  little to no response and their method of trying to contact them is such bs, that you can't report unless you're signed in, and I can't sign in.  It's easier to reset your password at the bank than with these guys.  For instance, you need a ticket number in order to fill out a form on the contact page, but right, can't get that unless you're signed in.I'm sorry but due to a computer crash some time back I don't have an account number.  And as far as public ID, all I have is my user ID which is/was taskatan2.I've submitted multiple emails, and even was able to talk to someone on the phone before that was suspended, so there must be some record of my multiple attempts to resolve this.Also, even though I did receive a couple responses from you, have never been given a "ticket number"And since you have emailed me, and you do show me as a customer, and you do have my DL Pic, how hard is it to email again, or call, me or ask for my DL pic again to prove I am who I say I am?  Because all the contact page nonsense, just isn't getting the job done.5/17   Still waiting on a response.  I've noticed a pattern here and that is, on your first complaint there is a response from Kraken sounding very sincere and forthright.  But upon updating my post wondering where is that earnest desire to make things right - crickets. I've pointed out the hysterical contradiction in acquiring a ticket number in order to contact you.  I need to be logged in to get one, but I cannot log in without one.  Insane. Eventually Trust Pilot will delete my post as they have done in the past.  I'll make another review, Kraken will again sincerely reply about their concern for my situation.  And that is that.This is my fourth update. if anybody is counting.

i have fully verified my account and have transferred 2000 eur to my kraken account from my bank, after when kraken received my money they closed my account with out any reason and explanation what happen. I asked them to return my money but they want me to go to police and to do report.looks like total SCAM. dont invest into kraken ever!My ticket number is 12657316

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wish I read these reviews before using Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I honestly wish I read the reviews about Kraken before using it.I created a Kraken account a few months ago and had no issues with KYC. I only had a few hundred dollars of crypto in my and very rarely used my account. All of a sudden I got an email saying my account is being closed and I nearly lost my crypto.Kraken refuses to give any reason for the closure. They say it's for security reasons but we all know it's an excuse.The support is also terrible and it's nearly impossible to reach support.I did some research and it seems this is common.DO NOT USE KRAKEN

list_of_reviews.review_title: Closed my account with no warning for…
list_of_reviews.review: Closed my account with no warning for no reason.  Thankfully i never had anything in it. Their 'support' is clearly automated with a persons name on it to make it seem more real. Despite not even replying to my query 5 days later they send me a how did we do survey. Truly believe they are just trolling at this point. It appears they are doing this left right and centre taking peoples money in the process. Feel sorry for anyone who had money in there. Cowboys

list_of_reviews.review_title: Excellent and helpful and efficient support service
list_of_reviews.review: I have had almost immediate help that was very efficient from Kraken support on several occasions the last time was 26th March Cant understand why people are complaining Amongst the lowest fees too. Much better functionality than Coinbase

I've been asked to verify my identity twice this year already. No issues the first time. Second time their verification process didn't work correctly due to an issue with the site using your camera. I emailed support. They got back days after telling me they knew they were having this issue. Never got back again even though I emailed them several times. Days later I tried again and it worked. A week ago I was asked to send a proof of address since I had moved. Still waiting...Ticket # 12519718Have emailed support several times and haven't received anu response. Kraken is a joke.

Transferred Sepa Instanta,6676 Euros,money came on krak,decided to go to trade,immediately the money is blocked,funds are clean,not stolen,sent from my accounts everything is fine.AA41 N84G ZRZM TOVY my ID.reference number Ticket # 12724622Emails are not answered for 24 hours and more.In chat they say they can't solve anything.They do not even say what is the reason for such a delay and so on.Just blocking any operationsAll degrees of verification passed, 2FA and other everywhere connected, all done according to the limits there are no problems at all.Only money came to the exchange, instantly blocked.......Support in e-mail (wait, wait, wait, wait no specifics)P.S.AddendumI received a message that my account was closed without cause and denied service.Requested to withdraw funds to the account from which I sent them the money. The request was accepted for processing.In 10 minutes I submitted a request for the same transaction from another exchange (I will not advertise anything here) from the 2nd exchange money has long come.What does Kraken do? Right, sends a message that my transfer (Sepa Instanta) is still in processing (although their website says that these transfers are carried out instantly) But in my case instantly I only have a nervous breakdown, the transaction itself has been in processing for half a day.I am sure that by the evening they will come up with a reason why the transaction will be blocked or again I will have to wait several days and answer my melas for several hours.

complete incompetence they dont respond to emails they blocked my account and wont give any reason and wont give me any information on the crypto acount that scamed me for 50 plus grand do not trust these people

This industry is so unregulated and should be shutdown my ticke no is 12738895. I just want my money back. There is nobody you can actually talk to its all through there chatbox and emails are all very robotic. I have provided them with all the info and fraudster digital wallet block chain code and Kraken cannot recover my funds or even attempt to track the fraudster. Please be aware folks stay away from this app. Be warned. Don't gamble your life savings on this app. Kraken should take some accountability and remove there license to trade in the stock exchange.

They keep saying they will investigate but never have. Now they have my app messed up saying I can’t be verified on this new phone when it’s the same phone I opened the account on. STAY AWAY FROM KRANKEN THEY WILL TAKE YOUR MONEY AND WILL NOT GIVE IT BACK TO YOU WHEN TIME COMES. THEY ARE A BUNCH OF THIEVES!!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: I placed an scheduled order to buy…
list_of_reviews.review: I placed a scheduled order to buy Bitcoin worth £3,500 when 1 Bitcoin fell to £52,314, to be paid with my account balance in Pound Sterling on May 20th. This morning, on May 21st, it fell to £51,944. When I talked with support, they said that my order failed due to adverse market conditions. When I asked for an explanation, they basically said that they are POOR and couldn't complete my order. STAY AWAY!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: My account was used in a scam
list_of_reviews.review: My account was used in a scam.  While Kraken was happy to let the scammer's access my account, they then failed to freeze it when requested, allowing the scammers to drain my funds.  They then emailed me saying they were closing my account, banning me from the site. They have refused to answer my questions, discuss the event with me or even tell me who their overseeing body is so that I can make a complaint.  I have been treated like a criminal by them and they won't take to me.Ticket # 12722716

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have used many different crypto…
list_of_reviews.review: I have used many different crypto exchanges the last 9 years. Kraken is the best in my estimation. The people behind it are trustworthy honourable people. Their fees are very reasonable. The interface is quite use friendly and works well. I felt obliged to write this review after I saw all the bad reviews..

Been using for about a month. Deposits always go missing and you have to ask the customer support for it to be credited to your account.Made a large deposit today, again it didn't show up in my account so I asked customer support. After a while they told me they were closing my account for 'security reasons' and they would return my money sometime in the future???So why wasn't I informed my account was closed before I made a deposit? I could still login prior to doing so.Absolutely disgraceful. No wonder they have such shockingly poor reviews here. So many better exchanges out there to go with. Thieves.

I opened an account with Kraken on 8 Apr 2024. For unknown reason, it was closed on the next day before I even had a chance to use it and was informed that I will not be allowed to open another one. No explanation given due to their “security” reason. Clearly, the only crime I have committed was to open an account with them. The worst was yet to come. Under such circumstance, one would assume that it is normal for a crypto exchange to refund a deposit immediately. Instead, I was forced to remain persistent with my follow ups nearly every day for more than five weeks before they decided to pay me back!  Isn’t it odd that while deposits are credited within one day, when it comes to payment or withdrawal, they are really good in dragging their feet! Although the Support team was helpful, they were restricted within their own boundary. By the way, don’t bother writing to the new CEO for help because he still has not learnt the fundamental manners of replying to his email yet. By comparison, other providers like Binance, ByBit and Coinbase may charge marginally higher fee but they are, by far, more professional than Kraken. After such an appalling experience, do you think I will recommend anyone to open an account with Kraken? Not a chance! Stay clear of this mob! They operate like scammers!

i have fully verified my account and have transferred 2000 eur to my kraken account from my bank, after when kraken received my money they closed my account with out any reason and explanation what happen. I asked them to return my money but they want me to go to police and to do report.looks like total SCAM. dont invest into kraken ever!My ticket number is 12657316
Quite better than other Platforms. I have problems investing from Bank. With Kraken was extremely quick. Also my issue with Support was handle pretty fast.My experience is positive here.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The absolute worst exchange in the UK
list_of_reviews.review: The absolute worst exchange in the UK, appalling customer service, slow and buggy support system. After completing verification and trading normally, suddenly they want another photo of me, even though I have been verified a year. Then after completing that step, now every time I want to buy, it says purchase successful but the asset is not actually in my account! it just disappears into their "holding" account. You cannot access the funds without calling them! imagine that process for every single trade. These people are a joke. Also, they also have no respect of the UK privacy laws and data deletion. Avoid at all costs.

list_of_reviews.review_title: No. 1 WORST exchange in the crypto space...
list_of_reviews.review: I normally don't have time to write review, but when I do. Only when it's really really good or, really really...bad.I've never experienced such a bad company like Kraken. I should have checked Trustpilot before I went ahead to open an account with them. Yes, 1.5 STAR. A HUGE RED FLAG!They closed my account for ***no reason*** after I made few test transactions (~AUD 75) deposit and withdraw back and forth to my Revolut bank account to see how things worked. Even when I escalated to their Reddit support, they still wanted to close and asked me not to register with them again in the future.Absolutely the worst. Do not do business with them, they don't need customers.

Great experience since then. People commenting bad reviews as they didn't understand much of the processes. Depositing depends on the method you are using.The 72 hour withdrawal hold is when you directly purchase any crypto using card or paypal.normal as stated on the Kraken deposit page or so. I even put more than 20,000 USDT in it and have my money move freely vice versa.

For over six months Kraken is withholding my funds. They state that there's a discrepancy in my personal details. There isn't. Goodbye thousands of euros.Whenever I check, the chat has a que of over 8 hours. You can't reach them by phone, and they barely reply to emails or a request via the contact form. Both my children have withdrawn all their funds from their accounts on Kraken. I advise everyone to do the same before encountering similar issues.Please dear people, don't use Kraken!

list_of_reviews.review_title: I should have checked Trust pilot..
list_of_reviews.review: I opened an account on the 27th of May, deposited 400£, purchased some Ethereum.On the 30th of May I tried to withdraw what I had, transaction was on hold, then the day after I got an email saying that my accounts would be closed and no further information will be disclosed..I guess I won't get my money back either..100% avoid krakenEdit to add support case numbers: 12889513 12902931

list_of_reviews.review_title: STAY AWAY LIKE GENUINELY STAY AWAY…
list_of_reviews.review: STAY AWAY LIKE GENUINELY STAY AWAY …..they will hold your crypto for a full 3 days just for the convenience of them thinking “ it’s to protect you “  in such a volatile space such as crypto and as a result u are forced to wait 3 whole days to access your funds and there’s no way around it when other exchanges. Make your crypto readily available to withdraw to an external wallet for goods and services . I wouldn't even give it half a star!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Have yet to hear anything since Apr.2…
list_of_reviews.review: Have yet to hear anything since Apr.2 which is when I was locked out.  I did get a response here after one post, but that was it. In order to submit a complaint to them you have to have a ticket number.  You can't get a ticket number unless you're logged in.  Anyway, I posted several of the harshest reviews here I could, and was blocked here once.  But I noticed that on the first complaint, by me and others, that Kraken responded with a "so sorry your frustrated by our endlessly sitting on our hands regards helping you, but we're busy, and, well, bye".   So, maybe it's been long enough and I'll get that response, or who, knows, I'll get some satisfaction.6/3   Yes, I did receive something from trust pilot/you on May 7.  It is more from trust pilot than from you however informing me of my lack of authenticity. But  I do see your reply to this post  in my gmail from yesterday @ 8pm 6/2.   I still cannot log in to my account.  Thanks for responding.6/4  The correct answer is NO.  Have not received any emails since 4/2.  I fill out the link where I'm supposed to get a code to reset password, and I never get an email.  I check spam, gmail, etc.

What can I say other than to echo the huge nunber of 1 star reviews. None-existent service - allowed my account to be hacked and used by criminals and then reported the use to the Police and closed my account without any warning or discussion, quoting “security reasons”.The only security reasons were Kraken’s themselves - either the y stole my money and closed my account, or allowed others to do it. Absolutely no response whatsoever from support to this day. AVOID THIS COMPANY LIKE THE PLAGUE IF YOU VALUE YOUR INVESTMENTS AND YOUR SANITY.TRULY HORRIFIC EXPERIENCE!!

Post reply from kraken:I’ve received that exact same response every single time I attempt to contact support via chat. “We see you already have an open ticket. We apologize for the delay, rest assured our specialists are working diligently on your ticket and will respond via email as soon as possible. If you have any additional questions please continue to communicate via email.  Please be patient our team will contact you once their investigation is completed”. Blah blah blah. No one has responded for 4 days. Not even an acknowledgement of receipt of my email. It is entirely an automated system. Their phone number is supposedly overworked and shut down. You cannot speak to a human. There are no answers. If they meant their response here (which was more than 3 hours ago) I would have heard something. Even just an email stating they are still working on it. Which is all I have requested over 40 times. NOTHING. At all cost AVOID KRAKEN!!!!!I was a new user. I was trading and unfortunately losing…. After less than 3 days I received an email from kraken stating they were closing my account within 72 hours and they were unable to provide any explanation and advised me to sell any currencies and withdraw all funds asap because once they closed my account I would no longer have access. Therefore I did exactly as told. Sold my crypto and made a cash withdrawal via e-transfer as I had been using that method for deposits. The first withdrawal was cancelled by kraken two hours later. So I verified all of my information and then attempted a second withdrawal. That was 4 days ago. I have been in contact with customer support, provided all of the requested verification documents which they confirmed receiving. That was three days ago. To date I have sent an additional 40 emails requesting information because my money says it has been withdrawn however I have not received a cent. I created another “ticket” asking about my withdrawal and was told I have no funds in my account to be withdrawn and that the withdrawal I did do was complete. Still customer support will not respond. Their FAQ regarding withdrawals all state maximum of 72 hours to complete in rare cases. So even if mine is a rare case my withdrawal should be complete by now. Also my account is still open. It still states all services are enabled and for sh*ts and giggles I attempted to make another deposit. And they accepted it. So they have not closed my account. But they have managed to STEAL my money. My next step is to report them to any and all agencies that I can. Ticket number 12931579. For reference

They happily charged me again for the conversion. I lost 5% of the money in the process, for literally having received no services, and having incurred a fair bit of stress waiting to hear what happened to my USDT withdrawal.Needless to say that the withdrawal of AUD out of Kraken was also delayed for a while, forcing me to get in contact with their support multiple times.Just stay away from them if you care about your money and mental health.

list_of_reviews.review_title: No. 1 WORST exchange in the crypto space...

list_of_reviews.review_title: Possibly the worst exchange I have ever…

I know 3 friends that have been banned for trying to withdraw their money, only to receive an email saying they can't disclose the reason for security reasons. Contact customer service for more information."I'm fully KYC verified, so it's not the case... PatheticAvoid at all cost.Ticket number: 4048607

list_of_reviews.review_title: They will close account without any reason
list_of_reviews.review: I made a mistake in sending them funds without including a reference number.  They have a system for allocating funds to the correct account, which I followed, but instead they returned my funds to my sending bank and closed my account, telling me I could not open another account.  They obviously have no interest in supporting customers and just exclude anyone on a whim.After reading my Trustpilot review they offered to escalate the matter, but when I did they sent me an email just reiterating what they told me initially. So that was a waste of time.  Unless I hear from them again...?

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken closed my account, no appeal possible
list_of_reviews.review: I used Kraken to convert CHF Swiss Franks to crypto because of it being 4 times less expensive then using other exchanges where I would need to pay my bank  1% to change my CHF to Euros or dollars then send the dollars to other exchanges and convert them there into crypto quantity. And out of the blue Kraken just closed my account, won't let me login to check of I still have leftover quantity and also won't let me appeal. Doest give a reason to why the account was closed. Even better still sends automatic marketing emails for me to come back since I haven't logged in for a while.  And responding here to use the email channel where it's just copy paste answer adventure... Amazing. Case Number 12956977

list_of_reviews.review_title: Stay away from Kraken - they forced me out while happily charging me
list_of_reviews.review: I created an account with them a few days ago, deposited money multiple times and bought USDT in two transactions with no issues. They happily charged me for the buy transactions. But then when I tried to withdraw the funds, they put it on hold. The next day after I contacted them, they told me that they're closing my account "for security reasons", and I have to convert back to AUD and transfer it back to my bank account. They happily charged me again for the conversion. I lost 5% of the money in the process, for literally having received no services, and having incurred a fair bit of stress waiting to hear what happened to my USDT withdrawal.Needless to say that the withdrawal of AUD out of Kraken was also delayed for a while, forcing me to get in contact with their support multiple times.Just stay away from them if you care about your money and mental health.
