However, negative reviews point out the repetitive call-to-action phrases and multiple links, which suggest the presence of bot-generated content, raising concerns about the authenticity and personalization of interactions. This repetitive and automated nature of content could potentially undermine user trust and satisfaction. To improve, the company should consider reducing the reliance on automated content and enhancing the personalization of their communications to foster a more genuine and engaging user experience. Further investigation into the balance between automation and human interaction could provide deeper insights into optimizing user engagement.

list_of_reviews.review_title: It is not a safe company totally
list_of_reviews.review: It is not a safe company totally. Recently I wired $10,000 to Kraken, and my bank informed me that the wired amount has successfully deposited into Kraken bank account. However, once they received the wired money, Kraken immediately told me that they will close my Kraken account for no reason and I cannot open another Kraken account, and they will refund the wired amount to me. Five days have passed, I and my bank have not received any response from Kraken. Actually, Kraken has attempted to hold my money for a long time and to even steal my money. Try to keep away from Kraken even though their fees seem lower than other crypto companies.

Joke tingHappy to take ur cash, charge you for it, then 4 days in close your account with no reason or explanation.I read the other reviews and was like nahhh no way these people are chatting $hit, I’ll risk it that never happens to me…. lol I beg u take note of this review and just decide not to bother

Proper confused by the reviews. I've had an account with Kraken for 4 years now, and literally never once had any issue or hiccup, deposits are borderline instant, withdrawals happen within 30 minutes now. Support has always answered my questions within 24hrs.Crypto purchasing and withdrawing has also been perfect, being able to whitelist and GSL your account is a massive peace of mind on a daily basis.I guess everythings OK until it's not, but they've been great to me.
Theft ,stealing,  that's what it boils down to they stole my money and closed down my account with no reason from one day to the next , if you value your  money don't use this exchange

Terrible experience! Don't waste your time. After signing up and giving them all of my personal information including a selfie of me holding my ID, I am still unable to deposit funds without signing Plaid into my bank which I do not want to do for obvious reasons. I figured it could possibly be a incompatible browser issue,  however,  I am unable to sign in from anything other than the initial device and browser that I signed up with. Super annoying and I'm done going through their useless customer service that leads you to nowhere but frustration !

list_of_reviews.review_title: Possibly the worst exchange I have ever…
list_of_reviews.review: Possibly the worst exchange I have ever come across. It is disgusting how they ban people without explanation, they should be closed down and not allowed to operate. I know 3 friends that have been banned for trying to withdraw their money, only to receive an email saying they can't disclose the reason for security reasons. If that isn't being treated with complete disdain, then I don't know. Disgusting behaviour from the platform. Hope you fail sooner than later. Scammers.We're considering putting a lawsuit against them.

You deposit money, the bank clears your money, you go to your account, and your money does not show - even with proof it was taken out of your bank account. You reach out to later find out they are closing your account with no information but were willing to take your deposits.

Few months ago made account. Received some xmr in crypto and then paid out in LTC to other crypto exchange (my main exchange). Now when I received some crypto today their system said that "Withdrawals have been suspended on your account. Contact customer service for more information."I'm fully KYC verified, so it's not the case... PatheticAvoid at all cost.Ticket number: 4048607

list_of_reviews.review_title: Stay away from Kraken - they forced me out while happily charging me
list_of_reviews.review: I created an account with them a few days ago, deposited money multiple times and bought USDT in two transactions with no issues. They happily charged me for the buy transactions. But then when I tried to withdraw the funds, they put it on hold. The next day after I contacted them, they told me that they're closing my account "for security reasons", and I have to convert back to AUD and transfer it back to my bank account. They happily charged me again for the conversion. I lost 5% of the money in the process, for literally having received no services, and having incurred a fair bit of stress waiting to hear what happened to my USDT withdrawal.Needless to say that the withdrawal of AUD out of Kraken was also delayed for a while, forcing me to get in contact with their support multiple times.Just stay away from them if you care about your money and mental health.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken closed my account, no appeal possible
list_of_reviews.review: I used Kraken to convert CHF Swiss Franks to crypto because of it being 4 times less expensive then using other exchanges where I would need to pay my bank  1% to change my CHF to Euros or dollars then send the dollars to other exchanges and convert them there into crypto quantity. And out of the blue Kraken just closed my account, won't let me login to check of I still have leftover quantity and also won't let me appeal. Doest give a reason to why the account was closed. Even better still sends automatic marketing emails for me to come back since I haven't logged in for a while.  And responding here to use the email channel where it's just copy paste answer adventure... Amazing. Case Number 12956977

This is a message I got from out of the blue... Unfortunately we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes we cannot disclose the reason for this action. Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account and that our live chat and phone support channels will not be able to provide assistance regarding this matter. We appreciate your understanding.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They will close account without any reason
list_of_reviews.review: I made a mistake in sending them funds without including a reference number.  They have a system for allocating funds to the correct account, which I followed, but instead they returned my funds to my sending bank and closed my account, telling me I could not open another account.  They obviously have no interest in supporting customers and just exclude anyone on a whim.After reading my Trustpilot review they offered to escalate the matter, but when I did they sent me an email just reiterating what they told me initially. So that was a waste of time.  Unless I hear from them again...?
Still advertises Monero being available. Makes you go through the whole registration and identity confirmation process for then to have the option greyed out.AND THEN THEY CHARGE 12€

Company can improve by not being too controlling of clients' finances. When I needed to withdraw some funds from my account, they refused to transfer money to my bank account. I simply closed everything and haven't bothered doing business with them after closing the account.

list_of_reviews.review_title: This platform is almost fraud with…
list_of_reviews.review: This platform is almost fraud with complete delay in services and the deductions are also very unpredictable...there customer support are very restricted....it ducks.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The pricing is not transparent & more expensive than compeititors
list_of_reviews.review: The platform has unclear pricing. It's not made clear if you are trading on the order book or where to use the traditional order form when using the website and can incur far higher fees as a result. The debit / credit card fees are not clear in their FAQs.

This exchange is likely one of the worst exchanges there is. They will not cancel transactions when asked to. They will put unnecessary withdraw locks on your account as they see fit. These are big boy scammers. Caution!!!!

FRAUD issues where £37,800 was allegedly paid to them via my bank, trying to contact them by phone, but the strangest and most unprofessional recording saying no one is there to take my call, byePAYWARD LTD. is trading as KRAKEN and it’s PAYWARDS tel.number given to me by a U.K. government source that provided that number: 02081649900

Hello, I deposited money on Kraken and on 24th with sepa instant and money still didnt came through. I spoke with chat and they send me to email support, can you please help? 12861780 ticket n umber. And now my account is closed, FOR WHAT REASON? I want to invest my money and you are closing my account, my money are deducted from the bank, is this a joke?

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have used many different crypto…
list_of_reviews.review: I have used many different crypto exchanges the last 9 years. Kraken is the best in my estimation. The people behind it are trustworthy honourable people. Their fees are very reasonable. The interface is quite use friendly and works well. I felt obliged to write this review after I saw all the bad reviews..

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken closed my account, no appeal possible
list_of_reviews.review: I used Kraken to convert CHF Swiss Franks to crypto because of it being 4 times less expensive then using other exchanges where I would need to pay my bank  1% to change my CHF to Euros or dollars then send the dollars to other exchanges and convert them there into crypto quantity. And out of the blue Kraken just closed my account, won't let me login to check of I still have leftover quantity and also won't let me appeal. Doest give a reason to why the account was closed. Even better still sends automatic marketing emails for me to come back since I haven't logged in for a while.  And responding here to use the email channel where it's just copy paste answer adventure... Amazing. Case Number 12956977

This is a message I got from out of the blue... Unfortunately we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes we cannot disclose the reason for this action. Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account and that our live chat and phone support channels will not be able to provide assistance regarding this matter. We appreciate your understanding.

Company can improve by not being too controlling of clients' finances. When I needed to withdraw some funds from my account, they refused to transfer money to my bank account. I simply closed everything and haven't bothered doing business with them after closing the account.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They will close account without any reason
list_of_reviews.review: I made a mistake in sending them funds without including a reference number.  They have a system for allocating funds to the correct account, which I followed, but instead they returned my funds to my sending bank and closed my account, telling me I could not open another account.  They obviously have no interest in supporting customers and just exclude anyone on a whim.After reading my Trustpilot review they offered to escalate the matter, but when I did they sent me an email just reiterating what they told me initially. So that was a waste of time.  Unless I hear from them again...?

list_of_reviews.review_title: Stay away from Kraken - they forced me out while happily charging me
list_of_reviews.review: I created an account with them a few days ago, deposited money multiple times and bought USDT in two transactions with no issues. They happily charged me for the buy transactions. But then when I tried to withdraw the funds, they put it on hold. The next day after I contacted them, they told me that they're closing my account "for security reasons", and I have to convert back to AUD and transfer it back to my bank account. They happily charged me again for the conversion. I lost 5% of the money in the process, for literally having received no services, and having incurred a fair bit of stress waiting to hear what happened to my USDT withdrawal.Needless to say that the withdrawal of AUD out of Kraken was also delayed for a while, forcing me to get in contact with their support multiple times.Just stay away from them if you care about your money and mental health.

Hello, I deposited money on Kraken and on 24th with sepa instant and money still didnt came through. I spoke with chat and they send me to email support, can you please help? 12861780 ticket n umber. list_of_reviews.review: what began as the best exchange user experience ended up a total disgrace and unprofessionalism from kraken. without giving any particular reason, my account was terminated and I was offered an option to withdraw my crypto balance to the same name bank account in fiat currency (!!)which is weird, as their terms of service section 16 Suspension; Termination; Discontinuance says directly “if we terminate your account, we’ll contact you to return any digital assets or NFTs in your account to you…”. to make it more convincing, they put another line there “you may terminate your account at any time by transferring your digital assets and redeeming your fiat balances to a financial account and ceasing to use our services.” which clearly distinguishes fiat and digital balances.nevertheless, I specifically mentioned to the customer service manager that my bank gave direct instructions that my last name should be listed before my first name as this is how client accounts are kept within the system. the customer support manager responded that it doesn’t matter which comes first and carried on sharing the link to the FAQ indicating the approximate timing for fiat withdrawal was 5 working days max.on day 7, I found no corresponding deposits to my account and texted kraken’s customer support again. so on thursday night, they get back saying that they’ve restored my kraken account and give me 48 hours to withdraw again. so now my balance is 55 EUR less than it was, which makes me wonder how the math works here if they mention that the maximum fee was 5 EUR when withdrawing fiat currency and they took 3 EUR for fiat deposit (!!).avoid at all costs, glad that I didn’t keep large sums there.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They refuse to follow Canadian law to the tee
list_of_reviews.review: They are unable to provide accurate information when directly asked. They also use AI to generate their responses. I called them out on this. That said, they refuse to provide accurate information, and skirt Canadian law by giving bogus information as they hope people won't look up the law. Every time they did so, I called them out on them and provided links to the government websites (we have multiple for my province). Furthermore, I am concerned that their customer support is in Ireland, since they are dealing with money. This means that if something happens to your money as a Canadian or American, they couldn't face our local laws. In other words, this is a security risk considering that some people invest thousands of dollars.Lastly, their reply ranges from 3-5 weeks. This in and of itself is alarming, considering they handle money. I am not surprised that the reviews here average below 1.5 stars.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Was really good at the beginning
list_of_reviews.review: Was really good at the beginning. Then after 7weeks of trading they decide to close my account. When I asked why, they gave me zero response, and now they have all my assets frozen and all withdrawals on hold for no reason. Do not invest. They are scammers. Takes them years to respond back. When I tried to ask why through chat, all they did was close the chat and made an email ticket. Waiting for 1 days now. Still no response on the ticket emails. Don’t invest. Customer service on kraken is a joke. Don’t waste your time or money. Give me my money scammers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken is a scam company plain and simple
list_of_reviews.review: I opened an account, did the verification, connected my account via Plaid and deposited $1,000. Later on, on got an email saying they suspected a breach on my account to reset my password as well as reset my email password and enable more security on my account and to reply that I had done these things. I did all that. Then I tried to buy some crypto and they said I was not allowed and to contact support so I did. They replied that they were closing my account but would not say why and they were holding my money for a week before they would release it. Sounds like a fraudulent company getting free loans and stealing money and hiding behind "laws" to get away with it. You have been warned, do not open an account with these scammers.

Was client for years. Now closed account. Yoshi (Kraken Support)Jun 24, 2024, 14:45 PDTHello, Unfortunately we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes we cannot disclose the reason for this action. Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account and that our live chat and phone support channels will not be able to provide assistance regarding this matter. We appreciate your understanding.

Absolute disaster of a company who take your money then if item needs exchanged then they simply ignore your emails although they state they will get back to you within 48 hours.  They don't.  Stay well clear folks, never again.

I made a deposit to my account on June 18. Since May i opened an account with them and bought some BTC for my wallets. After my last deposit on June 18 they just holded my deposit of Euro 100 without any information by email. I could only talk with a robot. After waiting till June 24 i opened a ticket to claim my money with them. Instead of helping they just send my money back to my bank account, informed me to sell my btc into euro and transfer back too. Without any explanation they closed my account within 72 hours, treating me like a suspicious user or so while i am just a normal total reliable person, never problems or a criminal record. It is real crazy good willing customers treating like criminals

list_of_reviews.review_title: They refuse to follow Canadian law to the tee
list_of_reviews.review: They are unable to provide accurate information when directly asked. They also use AI to generate their responses. I called them out on this. That said, they refuse to provide accurate information, and skirt Canadian law by giving bogus information as they hope people won't look up the law. Every time they did so, I called them out on them and provided links to the government websites (we have multiple for my province). Furthermore, I am concerned that their customer support is in Ireland, since they are dealing with money. This means that if something happens to your money as a Canadian or American, they couldn't face our local laws. In other words, this is a security risk considering that some people invest thousands of dollars.Lastly, their reply ranges from 3-5 weeks. This in and of itself is alarming, considering they handle money. I am not surprised that the reviews here average below 1.5 stars.

Opened a new account, made a small error in the wire instructions. When I noticed it didn't post, I contacted support who eventually found it then told me they were closing the account for security reasons.. what happened to 'the customer is always right'? Absolutely abysmal support and treats crypto newbies like children..STAY AWAY from this exchange..

Proper confused by the reviews. I've had an account with Kraken for 4 years now, and literally never once had any issue or hiccup, deposits are borderline instant, withdrawals happen within 30 minutes now. Support has always answered my questions within 24hrs.Crypto purchasing and withdrawing has also been perfect, being able to whitelist and GSL your account is a massive peace of mind on a daily basis.I guess everythings OK until it's not, but they've been great to me.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Possibly the worst exchange I have ever…
list_of_reviews.review: Possibly the worst exchange I have ever come across. It is disgusting how they ban people without explanation, they should be closed down and not allowed to operate. I know 3 friends that have been banned for trying to withdraw their money, only to receive an email saying they can't disclose the reason for security reasons. If that isn't being treated with complete disdain, then I don't know. Disgusting behaviour from the platform. Hope you fail sooner than later. Scammers.We're considering putting a lawsuit against them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: It is not a safe company totally
list_of_reviews.review: It is not a safe company totally. Recently I wired $10,000 to Kraken, and my bank informed me that the wired amount has successfully deposited into Kraken bank account. However, once they received the wired money, Kraken immediately told me that they will close my Kraken account for no reason and I cannot open another Kraken account, and they will refund the wired amount to me. Over one week has passed, I and my bank have not received any response from Kraken. Actually, Kraken has attempted to hold my money for a long time and to even steal my money. Try to keep away from Kraken even though their fees seem lower than other crypto companies.

Theft ,stealing,  that's what it boils down to they stole my money and closed down my account with no reason from one day to the next , if you value your  money don't use this exchange

Terrible experience! Don't waste your time. Super annoying and I'm done going through their useless customer service that leads you to nowhere but frustration !

list_of_reviews.review_title: Closing account out of the blue - withdrawals when?
list_of_reviews.review: Opened an account in Kraken Pro with no issues at all. Then, I made the first transfer from an Australian bank account through Osko, and the funds got credited almost instantaneously.In view of this, tried to top up with a larger deposit. This time the transaction did not go through. I contacted Kraken who opened a ticket to investigate. A few hours later I received an email saying that my 2nd deposit was going to be reverted and they were going to close my account within 72 hours. So I had to withdraw all my funds within that time! Of course, no explanation was given. While the second deposit was reverted successfully, I'm still waiting for the withdrawal request to reach my bank account. Kraken claims that it should be nearly instantaneous when using Osko. However, it seems this is the case only when they receive the deposit, not when you withdraw it! I'm still waiting for my funds to be returned (ticket # 13181345). Furthermore, sick of emails back and forth for something that should be that simple. Who knows if the funds will be returned, they claim that after 72 hours I won't be able to reach customer support any longer. All in all, terrible experience. Don't even want to think about those who hold large sums in that exchange. They can close your account in a whim or hold your funds until they want, if ever, to send them back to you. Stay away from Kraken, there are many other options in the market

list_of_reviews.review_title: They tell you to use there link but you…

I made a deposit to my account on June 18. Since May i opened an account with them and bought some BTC for my wallets. After my last deposit on June 18 they just holded my deposit of Euro 100 without any information by email. I could only talk with a robot. After waiting till June 24 i opened a ticket to claim my money with them. Instead of helping they just send my money back to my bank account, informed me to sell my btc into euro and transfer back too. list_of_reviews.review_title: Was really good at the beginning
list_of_reviews.review: Was really good at the beginning. Then after 7weeks of trading they decide to close my account. When I asked why, they gave me zero response, and now they have all my assets frozen and all withdrawals on hold for no reason. Do not invest. They are scammers. Takes them years to respond back. When I tried to ask why through chat, all they did was close the chat and made an email ticket. Waiting for 1 days now. Still no response on the ticket emails. Don’t invest. Customer service on kraken is a joke. Don’t waste your time or money. Give me my money scammers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They refuse to follow Canadian law to the tee
list_of_reviews.review: They are unable to provide accurate information when directly asked. They also use AI to generate their responses. I called them out on this. That said, they refuse to provide accurate information, and skirt Canadian law by giving bogus information as they hope people won't look up the law. Every time they did so, I called them out on them and provided links to the government websites (we have multiple for my province). Furthermore, I am concerned that their customer support is in Ireland, since they are dealing with money. This means that if something happens to your money as a Canadian or American, they couldn't face our local laws. In other words, this is a security risk considering that some people invest thousands of dollars.Lastly, their reply ranges from 3-5 weeks. This in and of itself is alarming, considering they handle money. I am not surprised that the reviews here average below 1.5 stars.

Opened a new account, made a small error in the wire instructions. When I noticed it didn't post, I contacted support who eventually found it then told me they were closing the account for security reasons.. what happened to 'the customer is always right'? Absolutely abysmal support and treats crypto newbies like children..STAY AWAY from this exchange..

list_of_reviews.review_title: Possibly the worst exchange I have ever…
list_of_reviews.review: Possibly the worst exchange I have ever come across. It is disgusting how they ban people without explanation, they should be closed down and not allowed to operate. I know 3 friends that have been banned for trying to withdraw their money, only to receive an email saying they can't disclose the reason for security reasons. If that isn't being treated with complete disdain, then I don't know. Disgusting behaviour from the platform. Hope you fail sooner than later. Scammers.We're considering putting a lawsuit against them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The pricing is not transparent & more expensive than compeititors
list_of_reviews.review: The platform has unclear pricing. It's not made clear if you are trading on the order book or where to use the traditional order form when using the website and can incur far higher fees as a result. The debit / credit card fees are not clear in their FAQs.

list_of_reviews.review_title: It is not a safe company totally
list_of_reviews.review: It is not a safe company totally. Recently I wired $10,000 to Kraken, and my bank informed me that the wired amount has successfully deposited into Kraken bank account. However, once they received the wired money, Kraken immediately told me that they will close my Kraken account for no reason and I cannot open another Kraken account, and they will refund the wired amount to me. Over one week has passed, I and my bank have not received any response from Kraken. Actually, Kraken has attempted to hold my money for a long time and to even steal my money. Try to keep away from Kraken even though their fees seem lower than other crypto companies.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I opened acc this morning on the advice…
list_of_reviews.review: I opened acc this morning on the advice of Wayne who said he was a fraud officer and the money I lost in January they wanted to pay me back. Thankfully I only used £12 to open the account. When I tried to withdraw there wasn't anywhere to withdraw so money gone because they've closed my account 😭😭😭scammers big style, Wayne is part of it too. PLEASE DONT USE THEM

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have used many different crypto…
list_of_reviews.review: I have used many different crypto exchanges the last 9 years. Kraken is the best in my estimation. The people behind it are trustworthy honourable people. Their fees are very reasonable. The interface is quite use friendly and works well. I felt obliged to write this review after I saw all the bad reviews..

list_of_reviews.review_title: Closing account out of the blue - withdrawals when?
list_of_reviews.review: Opened an account in Kraken Pro with no issues at all. Then, I made the first transfer from an Australian bank account through Osko, and the funds got credited almost instantaneously.In view of this, tried to top up with a larger deposit. This time the transaction did not go through. I contacted Kraken who opened a ticket to investigate. A few hours later I received an email saying that my 2nd deposit was going to be reverted and they were going to close my account within 72 hours. So I had to withdraw all my funds within that time! Of course, no explanation was given. While the second deposit was reverted successfully, I'm still waiting for the withdrawal request to reach my bank account. Kraken claims that it should be nearly instantaneous when using Osko. However, it seems this is the case only when they receive the deposit, not when you withdraw it! I'm still waiting for my funds to be returned (ticket # 13181345). Furthermore, sick of emails back and forth for something that should be that simple. Who knows if the funds will be returned, they claim that after 72 hours I won't be able to reach customer support any longer. All in all, terrible experience. Don't even want to think about those who hold large sums in that exchange. They can close your account in a whim or hold your funds until they want, if ever, to send them back to you. Stay away from Kraken, there are many other options in the market

Proper confused by the reviews. Support has always answered my questions within 24hrs.Crypto purchasing and withdrawing has also been perfect, being able to whitelist and GSL your account is a massive peace of mind on a daily basis.I guess everythings OK until it's not, but they've been great to me.

list_of_reviews.review: $7,000 "lost" by Kraken - Customer support tells me "it happens all the time" and tells me to wait (but not for how long).10 days after withdrawal of my funds (approx. $7,000) I start wondering why I can't see the amount in my bank account yet (normal process time is 1-5 days).The interactions with customer service initiated then has now been going on for well over a month.The information I receive are being labelled by my bank (Norways largest) as strange, and the situation as poorly handled and "strange" to use a kind word.Instead of usable information I get sent updates in banking language, that is furthermore explained wrongly (according to my bank).As of now, Kraken tells me they don't know where my money is.And I don't know how they will ever find out with their relaxed attitude to the issue.

Furthermore, I am concerned that their customer support is in Ireland, since they are dealing with money. This means that if something happens to your money as a Canadian or American, they couldn't face our local laws. In other words, this is a security risk considering that some people invest thousands of dollars.Lastly, their reply ranges from 3-5 weeks. This in and of itself is alarming, considering they handle money. I am not surprised that the reviews here average below 1.5 stars.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Closing account out of the blue - withdrawals when?
list_of_reviews.review: Opened an account in Kraken Pro with no issues at all. Then, I made the first transfer from an Australian bank account through Osko, and the funds got credited almost instantaneously.In view of this, tried to top up with a larger deposit. This time the transaction did not go through. I contacted Kraken who opened a ticket to investigate. A few hours later I received an email saying that my 2nd deposit was going to be reverted and they were going to close my account within 72 hours. So I had to withdraw all my funds within that time! Of course, no explanation was given. While the second deposit was reverted successfully, I'm still waiting for the withdrawal request to reach my bank account. Kraken claims that it should be nearly instantaneous when using Osko. However, it seems this is the case only when they receive the deposit, not when you withdraw it! I'm still waiting for my funds to be returned (ticket # 13181345). Furthermore, sick of emails back and forth for something that should be that simple. Who knows if the funds will be returned, they claim that after 72 hours I won't be able to reach customer support any longer. All in all, terrible experience. Don't even want to think about those who hold large sums in that exchange. They can close your account in a whim or hold your funds until they want, if ever, to send them back to you. Stay away from Kraken, there are many other options in the market

For security purposes we cannot disclose the reason for this action. Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account and that our live chat and phone support channels will not be able to provide assistance regarding this matter. We appreciate your understanding."Yeah don't be taking out loans and stuff under my name now

They replied that they were closing my account but would not say why and they were holding my money for a week before they would release it. list_of_reviews.review_title: I wired money to my Kraken account just…
list_of_reviews.review: I wired money to my Kraken account just to find out it was closed. I was wondering if the transfer arrived and tried to log in. No luck. I did not receive any communication about my account being closed! I sent over £900 and I am very frustrated because I don't see a way to return those money. I did message customer support, sure, but I already see with the reviews here that I might get nothing. Is there a collective lawsuit or something I can join lol? How can I get back my money?
Lost money as I wasn’t able to withdraw. A bunch of verification and red tape for withdrawing my funds. Horrible experience. Would not recommend

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have money in their site over $500…

$7,000 "lost" by Kraken - Customer support tells me "it happens all the time" and tells me to wait (but not for how long).10 days after withdrawal of my funds (approx. $7,000) I start wondering why I can't see the amount in my bank account yet (normal process time is 1-5 days).The interactions with customer service initiated then has now been going on for well over a month.The information I receive are being labelled by my bank (Norways largest) as strange, and the situation as poorly handled and "strange" to use a kind word.Instead of usable information I get sent updates in banking language, that is furthermore explained wrongly (according to my bank).As of now, Kraken tells me they don't know where my money is.And I don't know how they will ever find out with their relaxed attitude to the issue.

Proper confused by the reviews. I've had an account with Kraken for 4 years now, and literally never once had any issue or hiccup, deposits are borderline instant, withdrawals happen within 30 minutes now. Support has always answered my questions within 24hrs.Crypto purchasing and withdrawing has also been perfect, being able to whitelist and GSL your account is a massive peace of mind on a daily basis.I guess everythings OK until it's not, but they've been great to me.
What an absolute scam. 65usd to withdraw money. Money take 2 weeks to be withdrawn. The customer service based in India is absolutely useless. DO NOT USE THIS APP.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They will close your account for no…
list_of_reviews.review: They will close your account for no reason. I only use this wallet a few times and they have banned me for life without any explanation. I have tried multiple times to find out why and all they can say is we cannot say anything for security purposes.

list_of_reviews.review_title: It seems Kraken can't be trusted
list_of_reviews.review: It seems Kraken can't be trusted. My account was suddenly closed after I tried to buy crypto. I was informed that they can't disclose the reason for this action. Absolutely unacceptable to me. My money was paid back tome. Only generic replies on my emails. In the meantime, they have all your personal details on hand, and if they have such a no-care attitude with their clients, the question is how will they treat the personal details of clients whose accounts are just closed. Suggestion: Keep away from KRAKENHet lijkt erop dat Kraken niet te vertrouwen is.  Mij  account werd gesloten nadat ik crypto had gekocht en werd mij verteld dat ze de reden voor deze actie niet kunnen onthullen. Absoluut onaanvaardbaar voor mij. Mijn geld voor aankopen was wel teruggestort. Alleen niks zeggende reacties op mijn e-mails. Ondertussen hebben ze al je persoonlijke gegevens bij de hand en als ze zo’n lakse houding hebben ten opzichte van hun klanten, is de vraag hoe ze de persoonlijke gegevens van klanten waarvan de accounts gewoon zijn gesloten zullen behandelen. Suggestie: Blijf weg van KRAKEN

After filling out all of my account info I was ready to fund the account.  I went to the bank and following their directions I wired them the money.  4 hours later, I received an email saying because of security reasons they were closing my account and refused to tell me what I did wrong.  They closed with "you will not be able to open another account with Kraken."  Why would I want to do business with this rip off company?

list_of_reviews.review_title: Signed up because lots of people be…
list_of_reviews.review: Signed up because lots of people be praising them and said they are good, but meh oh how wrong they were. Lol got this on my email, after I submitted documents too. Legit just think they be phising for people's informations at this point. Absolutely scummy thing to do."Hello, Unfortunately we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes we cannot disclose the reason for this action. Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account and that our live chat and phone support channels will not be able to provide assistance regarding this matter. We appreciate your understanding."Yeah don't be taking out loans and stuff under my name now

Was client for years. Now closed account. Yoshi (Kraken Support)Jun 24, 2024, 14:45 PDTHello, Unfortunately we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes we cannot disclose the reason for this action. Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account and that our live chat and phone support channels will not be able to provide assistance regarding this matter. We appreciate your understanding.

I made a deposit to my account on June 18. Since May i opened an account with them and bought some BTC for my wallets. After my last deposit on June 18 they just holded my deposit of Euro 100 without any information by email. I could only talk with a robot. After waiting till June 24 i opened a ticket to claim my money with them. Instead of helping they just send my money back to my bank account, informed me to sell my btc into euro and transfer back too. Without any explanation they closed my account within 72 hours, treating me like a suspicious user or so while i am just a normal total reliable person, never problems or a criminal record. It is real crazy good willing customers treating like criminals

list_of_reviews.review_title: The pricing is not transparent & more expensive than compeititors
list_of_reviews.review: The platform has unclear pricing. It's not made clear if you are trading on the order book or where to use the traditional order form when using the website and can incur far higher fees as a result. The debit / credit card fees are not clear in their FAQs.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Closing account out of the blue - withdrawals when?
list_of_reviews.review: Opened an account in Kraken Pro with no issues at all. Then, I made the first transfer from an Australian bank account through Osko, and the funds got credited almost instantaneously.In view of this, tried to top up with a larger deposit. This time the transaction did not go through. I contacted Kraken who opened a ticket to investigate. A few hours later I received an email saying that my 2nd deposit was going to be reverted and they were going to close my account within 72 hours. So I had to withdraw all my funds within that time! Of course, no explanation was given. While the second deposit was reverted successfully, I'm still waiting for the withdrawal request to reach my bank account. Kraken claims that it should be nearly instantaneous when using Osko. However, it seems this is the case only when they receive the deposit, not when you withdraw it! I'm still waiting for my funds to be returned (ticket # 13181345). Furthermore, sick of emails back and forth for something that should be that simple. Who knows if the funds will be returned, they claim that after 72 hours I won't be able to reach customer support any longer. All in all, terrible experience. Don't even want to think about those who hold large sums in that exchange. They can close your account in a whim or hold your funds until they want, if ever, to send them back to you. Stay away from Kraken, there are many other options in the market

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have used many different crypto…
list_of_reviews.review: I have used many different crypto exchanges the last 9 years. Kraken is the best in my estimation. The people behind it are trustworthy honourable people. Their fees are very reasonable. The interface is quite use friendly and works well. I felt obliged to write this review after I saw all the bad reviews..
worst experience ..1500 pounds transferred to chase ..Names Owen LIttle but did not arrive...Kraken are crooks..Check email

list_of_reviews.review_title: The pricing is not transparent & more expensive than compeititors
list_of_reviews.review: The platform has unclear pricing. It's not made clear if you are trading on the order book or where to use the traditional order form when using the website and can incur far higher fees as a result. The debit / credit card fees are not clear in their FAQs.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for kraken.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Common praise for kraken.com includes "efficient processes," "robust security," and "speed." Frequent concerns are "customer service issues," "high commissions," "email spams," and "P2P problems." These phrases highlight the balance between operational efficiency and user service challenges.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 1.5, calculated from ratings of 1 and 2. The distribution shows low satisfaction, with both reviews highlighting significant issues, indicating general user dissatisfaction.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews praise efficient processes, robust security, and informed decision-making, while negative reviews criticize customer service, high commissions, email spams, and P2P issues. The quality and specificity of content are key differentiators.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews focus on efficient processes, robust security, and speed with specific, informed content. Negative reviews criticize customer service, high commissions, email spams, and P2P issues, often citing repetitive, generic phrasing. Key differentiators are content quality, specificity, and user service experiences.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the kraken.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Reviews indicate mixed effectiveness of Kraken's customer support. While some users report resolved technical issues, overall feedback highlights significant dissatisfaction with responsiveness and service quality, suggesting that improvements are needed in customer support interactions.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews reveal a mix of positive and negative feedback, with key themes emerging around efficiency, security, and user experience. Positive feedback highlights efficient processes, robust security, and informed decision-making, indicating a well-functioning system with clear communication and transparency. However, critical issues include poor customer service, high commissions, frequent email spams, and problems with peer-to-peer (P2P) services, which detract from the overall user experience. The quality and specificity of content in positive reviews contrast sharply with the repetitive and generic nature of negative reviews, underscoring a need for better customer support and clearer communication. Potential areas for improvement include addressing customer service concerns, reducing commissions, managing email communications more effectively, and resolving P2P service issues to enhance user satisfaction.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They advertise payments as being FPS…
list_of_reviews.review: They advertise payments as being FPS (faster payment service) yet I don’t receive my funds for days. It’s WRONG. False advertisement. I asked the live chat who they are regulated by and chat help “sunny” just kept ignoring my messages and avoiding the question.Use someone else honestly don’t bother.

list_of_reviews.review_title: If I could give 0 i would
list_of_reviews.review: If I could give 0 i would, 72 hours wait before you can use the money/crypto you deposit there, they have made up rules for everything, expect to loose minimum 10% of everything you deposit then buy crypto with.... And another 10% if you withdraw them, this is not a serious actor like binance or hitbtc where you can make money and transfer as you like more or less with acceptable fees ,and rules are obvious ones

I’ve read enough here to know I’ve been taken. I’ve scheduled a video call but now I know to give up on retrieving the $ I wasted. This world is run by evil scammers so don’t expect any help or recourse.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Please avoid this at all cost
list_of_reviews.review: Please avoid this at all cost, you will be charge twice even though you have already paid it, then a week later you will be charged again with the same price which will put you into debts via paypal or credit/debit card.

Out of all the exchanged I have used, Binance, Kucoin, GateIO , this has to be one of the worst. Not user friendly and buggy.I had USD sitting in my account but I cannot convert or trade it. What the hell is going on with them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: CLOSED MY ACCOUNT WITH NO REASON
list_of_reviews.review: CLOSED MY ACCOUNT WITH NO REASON. I HAD A WIRE TRANSFER ON THE WAY. THE FIRST ONE TOOK LESS THAN 1 DAY TO ARRIVE WHICH I COULD WITHDRAW OUT OF THE ACCOUNT. THE SECOND (USD 18,000) WAS NEVER CREDITED. I WAS INFORMED ON MONDAY 22ND JULY WILL TAKE 1-5 BUSINESS DAYS TO RETURN THE FUNDS. NO SIGN OF MY MONEY. RUN AWAY FROM THESE SCAMMERS DON'T SEND A PENNY. PLAIN ROBERRYTicket # 13326305

Had an amazing experience initially with them. Then they closed my account since I am EU-citizen. That's totally understandable and okay. This happened already 3 months ago. They gave me a possibility to withdraw my cryptos (one month after suspension). Though they still don't give me a possibility to withdraw the fiat ($1.5k). I just don't understand what is the problem to convert fiat to USDT and allow me to withdraw. I've tried to contact them multiple times, their payment team is working on it. They don't even provide any ETA on the case. What are they working on? Just convert the fiat and give me my funds back. Ticked ID:  12598428I strongly advice anyone who is considering this exchange to use for trading - don't do that. It's a nice exchange, though there is a huge possibility your funds will get stuck and you will wait countless days without access to your funds. Will update my review after I receive my funds (hopefully).

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken have blocked a withdrawal of EU…
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken have blocked a withdrawal of EU 200 citing AML reasons. They have now closed my account. They are clearly not trustworthy and people should exercise extreme caution in dealing with them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Didn't fix deposit issues with INJ…
list_of_reviews.review: Didn't fix deposit issues with INJ token in Injective network after 3 months. Other exchanges for some reason don't have any issues with Injective network.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Only had this account for not even a…
list_of_reviews.review: Only had this account for not even a week and got my account closed. Getting in touch with anyone over the phone is a pure joke and the automated response you get on the app is just as frustrating. Horrible customer service. Hoping to get all my money out!!

Lost the access to my account more than a month ago - contacted the support team  and nothing has really happened ever since. Told them that I can’t reset the password as I never get the emails and even changed email address but nothing really worked. I understand the other review here, seems to be a scheme to scam people - good job! Ticket number 13014422. Takes them days and weeks to even reply, so what’s going on?UPDATE: nothing changed but they do reply to every review I made sharing my experience.

ScamTold me they were closing my account with no reason. I have tried to transfer my USDT out following their own policy in their T&C but they refuse.They keep saying they have reached out to me but they don’t actually do anything to address the issue. There are no instructions and they cancelled my withdrawal requests. They have my USDT1.2k and I can’t access it. Do not use.

Proper confused by the reviews. I've had an account with Kraken for 4 years now, and literally never once had any issue or hiccup, deposits are borderline instant, withdrawals happen within 30 minutes now. Support has always answered my questions within 24hrs.Crypto purchasing and withdrawing has also been perfect, being able to whitelist and GSL your account is a massive peace of mind on a daily basis.I guess everythings OK until it's not, but they've been great to me.

After realized scammed, I filled refund claim to Kraken and then Kraken closed my account permanently  without giving any reason.Sad to see Kraken is used by scammers of the crypto-currency  trading scams.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wired money to my Kraken account just…
list_of_reviews.review: I wired money to my Kraken account just to find out it was closed. I was wondering if the transfer arrived and tried to log in. No luck. I did not receive any communication about my account being closed! I sent over £900 and I am very frustrated because I don't see a way to return those money. I did message customer support, sure, but I already see with the reviews here that I might get nothing. Is there a collective lawsuit or something I can join lol? How can I get back my money?

list_of_reviews.review_title: The pricing is not transparent & more expensive than compeititors
list_of_reviews.review: The platform has unclear pricing. It's not made clear if you are trading on the order book or where to use the traditional order form when using the website and can incur far higher fees as a result. The debit / credit card fees are not clear in their FAQs.

list_of_reviews.review_title: If I can put 0 starts this is what I…
list_of_reviews.review: If I can put 0 starts this is what I will do now . This is a scam company ! Don’t use it ! They hold your funds for no reason.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have used many different crypto…
list_of_reviews.review: I have used many different crypto exchanges the last 9 years. Kraken is the best in my estimation. The people behind it are trustworthy honourable people. Their fees are very reasonable. The interface is quite use friendly and works well. I felt obliged to write this review after I saw all the bad reviews..

list_of_reviews.review: Awfully poor customer service. Very good on managing public perception but nothing actually happens. The in-app chat cut-off the conversation with a simple 'this has been moved to emails'. No emails have been recieved. All the guidance says deposits might be held for 3 days (they don't tell you that before depositing though) but they still haven't released mine. So many reviews say the same thing - stay clear.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They advertise payments as being FPS…
list_of_reviews.review: They advertise payments as being FPS (faster payment service) yet I don’t receive my funds for days. It’s WRONG. False advertisement. I asked the live chat who they are regulated by and chat help “sunny” just kept ignoring my messages and avoiding the question.Use someone else honestly don’t bother.

Be very careful when depositing cash with PayPal as they will lock up the balance for 72 hours. Apart from that you will have to go through very long and exhausting identification processes to not get your account locked.

I’ve read enough here to know I’ve been taken. I’ve scheduled a video call but now I know to give up on retrieving the $ I wasted. This world is run by evil scammers so don’t expect any help or recourse.Ticket #13318892. Surprise me and return the “liquidity” fee I paid you which somehow disappeared into cyber space. Keep the (fake) $187k as a tip. Lol

list_of_reviews.review_title: If I could give 0 i would
list_of_reviews.review: If I could give 0 i would, 72 hours wait before you can use the money/crypto you deposit there, they have made up rules for everything, expect to loose minimum 10% of everything you deposit then buy crypto with.... And another 10% if you withdraw them, this is not a serious actor like binance or hitbtc where you can make money and transfer as you like more or less with acceptable fees ,and rules are obvious ones

After providing exhaustive credentials to open an account, I chose to close it and then they would not verify that they were going to delete all my sensitive information.I was a fool to deal with this lousy company.Buyer Beware

list_of_reviews.review_title: Please avoid this at all cost
list_of_reviews.review: Please avoid this at all cost, you will be charge twice even though you have already paid it, then a week later you will be charged again with the same price which will put you into debts via paypal or credit/debit card.

list_of_reviews.review_title: CLOSED MY ACCOUNT WITH NO REASON
list_of_reviews.review: CLOSED MY ACCOUNT WITH NO REASON. I HAD A WIRE TRANSFER ON THE WAY. THE FIRST ONE TOOK LESS THAN 1 DAY TO ARRIVE WHICH I COULD WITHDRAW OUT OF THE ACCOUNT. THE SECOND (USD 18,000) WAS NEVER CREDITED. I WAS INFORMED ON MONDAY 22ND JULY WILL TAKE 1-5 BUSINESS DAYS TO RETURN THE FUNDS. NO SIGN OF MY MONEY. RUN AWAY FROM THESE SCAMMERS DON'T SEND A PENNY. PLAIN ROBERRYTicket # 13326305

Had an amazing experience initially with them. Then they closed my account since I am EU-citizen. That's totally understandable and okay. This happened already 3 months ago. They gave me a possibility to withdraw my cryptos (one month after suspension). Though they still don't give me a possibility to withdraw the fiat ($1.5k). I just don't understand what is the problem to convert fiat to USDT and allow me to withdraw. I've tried to contact them multiple times, their payment team is working on it. They don't even provide any ETA on the case. What are they working on? Just convert the fiat and give me my funds back. Ticked ID:  12598428I strongly advice anyone who is considering this exchange to use for trading - don't do that. It's a nice exchange, though there is a huge possibility your funds will get stuck and you will wait countless days without access to your funds. Will update my review after I receive my funds (hopefully).

Lost the access to my account more than a month ago - contacted the support team  and nothing has really happened ever since. Told them that I can’t reset the password as I never get the emails and even changed email address but nothing really worked. I understand the other review here, seems to be a scheme to scam people - good job! Ticket number 13014422. Takes them days and weeks to even reply, so what’s going on?UPDATE: nothing changed but they do reply to every review I made sharing my experience.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Only had this account for not even a…
list_of_reviews.review: Only had this account for not even a week and got my account closed. Getting in touch with anyone over the phone is a pure joke and the automated response you get on the app is just as frustrating. Horrible customer service. Hoping to get all my money out!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken have blocked a withdrawal of EU…
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken have blocked a withdrawal of EU 200 citing AML reasons. They have now closed my account. They are clearly not trustworthy and people should exercise extreme caution in dealing with them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Didn't fix deposit issues with INJ…
list_of_reviews.review: Didn't fix deposit issues with INJ token in Injective network after 3 months. Other exchanges for some reason don't have any issues with Injective network.

Proper confused by the reviews. I've had an account with Kraken for 4 years now, and literally never once had any issue or hiccup, deposits are borderline instant, withdrawals happen within 30 minutes now. Support has always answered my questions within 24hrs.Crypto purchasing and withdrawing has also been perfect, being able to whitelist and GSL your account is a massive peace of mind on a daily basis.I guess everythings OK until it's not, but they've been great to me.

ScamTold me they were closing my account with no reason. I have tried to transfer my USDT out following their own policy in their T&C but they refuse.They keep saying they have reached out to me but they don’t actually do anything to address the issue. There are no instructions and they cancelled my withdrawal requests. They have my USDT1.2k and I can’t access it. Do not use.

list_of_reviews.review_title: This app literally steals your money
list_of_reviews.review: This app literally steals your money. When you invest or buy stock at a certain price the app automatically charges you more than the stock exchange price and then when you sell it automatically sells it for less than the exchange rate. Basically unless the stocks are tremendously there's no way to make money with the app because the small amounts that you make the app consumes has a platform fee for everything you do

This has been an absolutely horrifying experience for me.

I asked the live chat who they are regulated by and chat help “sunny” just kept ignoring my messages and avoiding the question.Use someone else honestly don’t bother.

I’ve read enough here to know I’ve been taken. I’ve scheduled a video call but now I know to give up on retrieving the $ I wasted. This world is run by evil scammers so don’t expect any help or recourse.Ticket #13318892. Surprise me and return the “liquidity” fee I paid you which somehow disappeared into cyber space. Keep the (fake) $187k as a tip. Lol

list_of_reviews.review_title: Please avoid this at all cost
list_of_reviews.review: Please avoid this at all cost, you will be charge twice even though you have already paid it, then a week later you will be charged again with the same price which will put you into debts via paypal or credit/debit card.

After providing exhaustive credentials to open an account, I chose to close it and then they would not verify that they were going to delete all my sensitive information.I was a fool to deal with this lousy company.Buyer Beware

Lost the access to my account more than a month ago - contacted the support team  and nothing has really happened ever since. Told them that I can’t reset the password as I never get the emails and even changed email address but nothing really worked. I understand the other review here, seems to be a scheme to scam people - good job! Ticket number 13014422. Takes them days and weeks to even reply, so what’s going on?UPDATE: nothing changed but they do reply to every review I made sharing my experience.

list_of_reviews.review_title: If I could give 0 i would
list_of_reviews.review: If I could give 0 i would, 72 hours wait before you can use the money/crypto you deposit there, they have made up rules for everything, expect to loose minimum 10% of everything you deposit then buy crypto with.... And another 10% if you withdraw them, this is not a serious actor like binance or hitbtc where you can make money and transfer as you like more or less with acceptable fees ,and rules are obvious ones

Had an amazing experience initially with them. Then they closed my account since I am EU-citizen. That's totally understandable and okay. This happened already 3 months ago. They gave me a possibility to withdraw my cryptos (one month after suspension). Though they still don't give me a possibility to withdraw the fiat ($1.5k). I just don't understand what is the problem to convert fiat to USDT and allow me to withdraw. I've tried to contact them multiple times, their payment team is working on it. They don't even provide any ETA on the case. What are they working on? Just convert the fiat and give me my funds back. Ticked ID:  12598428I strongly advice anyone who is considering this exchange to use for trading - don't do that. It's a nice exchange, though there is a huge possibility your funds will get stuck and you will wait countless days without access to your funds. Will update my review after I receive my funds (hopefully).

Proper confused by the reviews. I won’t be doing anymore business with them and I’m visiting every review site I find.

list_of_reviews.review: I couldn't complete one transaction with Kraken. I opened an account with Kraken on the advice of a friend and then funded the account w/a transfer from my bank. Even before I could complete my first transaction I was notified that my account was being closed, and that for "security purposes", they couldn't tell me why. It was strange. It's as if a cop pulls you over, writes you a ticket, but you're given no information as to what you did wrong. My money got tied up for a couple days but they eventually released it back to me.

I will be honest in my review. I bought 1 Ethereum at the price of £2,298, and all of a sudden, my portfolio shows that I bought it at £2,348.69 on a receipt. But I never bought it at that price! There's a £50 difference, and this isn't even a fee because my purchase details already show a £23.49 fee. That £50 difference, plus the actual fee of £23.49, makes no sense. I don’t know where this came from, as I would never have bought at that price. It's very frustrating because I didn't make the purchase at that price, yet they recorded it as if I did.

Opened an account and wired the funds as directed. Then get an email the account is closed and not to create any future accounts ( for “security reasons ???). Then get charged a wire fee to send my money back. What a scam. DO NOT USE KRACKEN

list_of_reviews.review: I've been using Kraken for some years and always loved the Interface and User experience. That was until I had to reverify my German Account because of some legal changes in Europe. The process itself was very smooth. I checked some boxes, uploaded a document, did a web identification. And then nothing happened. My account was frozen for a week. After my wife did go through the same process and got verified within hours I became sceptical and wrote a ticket. ...After writing SEVERAL Tickets (I know you shouldn't but the standardized answers did neither explain nor do anything) some lady at least wrote there was a problem with my name between my account and my passport (probably because I have several names). She allegedly demanded a new web assessment and I had to wait a bit more until it would be open. This was about one and a half months ago. I wrote the support again and again, got no explanations except 'it takes more time' or no answers at all. I even installed Krakens App to get live Support via chat but instead of helping the advisers there only reminded my contact persons to support me which they still didn't. Now automated reminders are coming that I still need to re-verify my qccount or otherwise my orders will be deleted. My account has been frozen for two months and my relationsship with Kraken went from 'best Crypto Broker of all time' to 'worst broker you could fall for'. Now I have to find another good broker which takes time but is at least doable whereas no one knows if my account can be used in two months from now again if ever. Somehow the process has been stuck, there might be a technical failure but nobody at Kraken seems to even care or ask themselves what went wrong, not to mention an apology for this mess. I mean how hard can it be to reopen a web assessment process which took two minutes initiate? Now it takes months to open it for a second time and nobody asks why? My account apparently has been stuck in a technical glitch or whatever but I won't. Thank you Kraken for those years but this is a ridiculous waste of my time. For all those thinking about using Kraken: Better don't if you don't want to risk your assets being stuck in an exchange you can't use. Probably some poor soul will write here again that my problem is being processed. And then again nothing will happen. Don't let them fool you! (If I'm wrong I will delete this gladly and immediately.)

I will be honest in my review. I bought 1 Ethereum at the price of £2,298, and all of a sudden, my portfolio shows that I bought it at £2,348.69 on a receipt. But I never bought it at that price! There's a £50 difference, and this isn't even a fee because my purchase details already show a £23.49 fee. That £50 difference, plus the actual fee of £23.49, makes no sense. I don’t know where this came from, as I would never have bought at that price. It's very frustrating because I didn't make the purchase at that price, yet they recorded it as if I did.

I followed all required cash investments on my part to secure my account before attempting to deposit a significant  amount of LUSD. 24 hours after I deposited from my self managed wallet I still have no notification of received funds. Still no confirmation of funds received.Now nobody can find my deposit, a d another request for a significant cash deposit. Now I make a request asking us thus the last cash payment or is there more to come. I MAID a lot of noise to numerous people.  Next thing I receive back my all my LUSD,  but they converted the coin portion of my transfer to LUSD. I have a good mind to supply all my emails and banking data to the antifraud division of RCMP and regulatory agencies.Ticket#13499878

I withdrew $145 from my btc account and by time it reached its destination an hour later it was $37.00 . There responded with I should pay more attention to the fee and yeah I get it but never in a million years would I ever expect a $108 fee. If they flagged it when it gets that high so we look more closely or put it in dollars do it’s easier to decipher. Of course I asked to speak with a supervisor but have yet to hear from anyone. I probably bought and traded $2000 in btc the last two days alone . I know that’s nothing to them but it’s a hell of a lot to me. I won’t be doing anymore business with them and I’m visiting every review site I find.

list_of_reviews.review: I wanted to buy 25£ worth of solana, nothing major, as I wanted to activate my Phantom Wallet.So I go to open an account, they make me wait 24 hours to deposit.After I deposit, they take a 1.24£ fee without telling me prior to me buying it, so I'm left with only 23.76£ worth of solana. Whatever, not that much but still annoying I wasn't told beforehand.Then, I'm told for "security reasons" I can't send MY assets to MY Phantom wallet for another 72 hours! I wonder what will happen after these 72 hours pass, probably make me wait another 7 years because the stars have aligned in a specific pattern!My advice: stay away if you actually want to use your cryptocurrencies productively because this company sure as hell won't let you!

Disgraceful company. Opened an account, verified with photo ID, and made an initial deposit (so I could try using the platform see if I wanted to invest more later down the line), from my bank account that is registered at the same address as on the ID.Held my faster payments deposit for 4 days, when I contact support they email me several hours later telling me they are closing my account and returning the funds to my account. No reason given whatsoever - if a bank were to close your account - they tell you why.So I'm currently waiting for the money to return to my account - they were happy to take it, lets see if they are happy to return it.Moral of the story? Use another platform.Kraken support ticket: # 13682011

list_of_reviews.review_title: I also got screwed by Kraken

When I went to transfer to my cold wallet, that function was blocked.  A few hours later, I got a notice to liquidate and drain the acct within 72 hours or be locked out.   No explanation.  No recourse.public id: AA87 N84G BS65 YJLQ

Scammers with the worst rates, I bought bitcoin for 75 euros. In addition to high commissions for the purchase, they charge a huge commission for transferring to another wallet, about 15 euros, I don’t remember the exact figure, it’s ridiculous to lose 25 out of 75 euros.Their security control system is just nonsense, during the transfer to another wallet, it was written that something like we cannot perform this transaction (in the end, the money came to another wallet, but I spent time investigating the problem and in vain). I will never use this service again, unless I want to get a headache.

Didn’t even manage to deposit money, as it was held hostage for 96 hours, then when I contacted to get that issue resolved, they responded by saying they’re closing my account permanently and blocking me from making another. Naturally they don’t give you a reason cos they’re a scam.

They take really long to assist via support. 3. They closed my account due to “security reasons” and can’t tell me why. 4. Steps are provided to use the app and those steps don’t relate to the app.  An app should never be this hard to navigate. DO BETTER!
Terrible. They steel your money by transfering to their account and after complaining they close your account.

It’s a lie the answer they gave me here. I sent 3 emails to know what was wrong. I opened an account and made all verifications they asked me. All seems good but after two hours they closed my account, without the possibility to open a new one. In a mail the operator Frankie  said that they closed it for security reasons and I’m not allowed to open another one. I sent other 2 emails asking why , but they answered that they cannot tell me why. They treated me like criminal for no reason…I don’t think a serious platform can do this with the costumers without an explanation. I think the problem is someone who can’t do properly his job and closed my account but he doesn’t have an explication. Or he’s just racist and treated me like a sh**t! Ticket # 13634731

I couldn't complete one transaction with Kraken. I opened an account with Kraken on the advice of a friend and then funded the account w/a transfer from my bank. Even before I could complete my first transaction I was notified that my account was being closed, and that for "security purposes", they couldn't tell me why. It was strange. It's as if a cop pulls you over, writes you a ticket, but you're given no information as to what you did wrong. My money got tied up for a couple days but they eventually released it back to me.

Very bad app, they literally stole money from my mom on my bday. She made a transfer that said hold for almost a week and her account was initially active , in fact we have used the app 4 times and on 5th time they couldn’t provide a reason for the hold . The initial hold is 72 hours and after that the account is meant to work normally. What’s more painful is that my mom worked an extra shift to send that money to me for my bday and they started asking stupid questions like who and why she is sending the money. She provided all details and they never replied back . Just two days ago the money transfer in the app said failed and a new transaction was made by kraken saying transferred but the money never came to me nor was it returned back to her . When crypto is sent withdrawn to a wallet , in the withdrawal wallet it shows all incoming crypto until the hash is solved in the network and the money is then sent to the withdrawal wallet. In theory the money was held by the platform kraken and was neither sent nor returned and the only name for that is stealing .

Lost over $230.00 in transaction fees and loss on quick liquidation of ETH. Asking for reimbursement of loss since I was forced to liquidate account without explanation. Kraken--- A rip off of time and money.

Worst ever company I used. I did a sepa bank transfer 25,000£ and the blocked my account without any further explanation and sent back 24700£ Absolute scammers don’t advise anyone to use that platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I also got screwed by Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I also got screwed by Kraken, which was my very first crypto account and trade.  I set up the account, I made 1st trade for modest test amount ($1k for me is modest).  When I went to transfer to my cold wallet, that function was blocked.  A few hours later, I got a notice to liquidate and drain the acct within 72 hours or be locked out.   No explanation.  No recourse.public id: AA87 N84G BS65 YJLQ

Scammers with the worst rates, I bought bitcoin for 75 euros. In addition to high commissions for the purchase, they charge a huge commission for transferring to another wallet, about 15 euros, I don’t remember the exact figure, it’s ridiculous to lose 25 out of 75 euros.Their security control system is just nonsense, during the transfer to another wallet, it was written that something like we cannot perform this transaction (in the end, the money came to another wallet, but I spent time investigating the problem and in vain). I will never use this service again, unless I want to get a headache.

Didn’t even manage to deposit money, as it was held hostage for 96 hours, then when I contacted to get that issue resolved, they responded by saying they’re closing my account permanently and blocking me from making another. Naturally they don’t give you a reason cos they’re a scam.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I am into my 3rd week of seeking…
list_of_reviews.review: I am into my 3rd week of seeking customer support to withdraw my assets, and Kraken simply ignores me. Terrible customer service. I strongly urge users to avoid this company.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The open orders tab doesnt load
list_of_reviews.review: The open orders tab doesnt load, main page also doesnt load. F your js sites. Nothing works.

DO NOT USE KRAKEN!!! My overall experience was AWFUL!1. You’re to follow a bunch of rules and wait daaaayyyyssss for crypto/money to be deposited and withdrawn. 2. They take really long to assist via support. 3. They closed my account due to “security reasons” and can’t tell me why. 4. Steps are provided to use the app and those steps don’t relate to the app.  An app should never be this hard to navigate. DO BETTER!

list_of_reviews.review_title: My cash deposit is still on hold…
list_of_reviews.review: My cash deposit was on hold to bad the chat on customer support could not solve my problem like they told me they did.After contact here my problem is solved quick and swift thanks for restoring confidence to use the platform again.

It’s a lie the answer they gave me here. I sent 3 emails to know what was wrong. I opened an account and made all verifications they asked me. All seems good but after two hours they closed my account, without the possibility to open a new one. In a mail the operator Frankie  said that they closed it for security reasons and I’m not allowed to open another one. I sent other 2 emails asking why , but they answered that they cannot tell me why. They treated me like criminal for no reason…I don’t think a serious platform can do this with the costumers without an explanation. I think the problem is someone who can’t do properly his job and closed my account but he doesn’t have an explication. Or he’s just racist and treated me like a sh**t! Ticket # 13634731

I couldn't complete one transaction with Kraken. I opened an account with Kraken on the advice of a friend and then funded the account w/a transfer from my bank. Even before I could complete my first transaction I was notified that my account was being closed, and that for "security purposes", they couldn't tell me why. It was strange. It's as if a cop pulls you over, writes you a ticket, but you're given no information as to what you did wrong. My money got tied up for a couple days but they eventually released it back to me.

list_of_reviews.review_title: This app literally steals your money
list_of_reviews.review: This app literally steals your money. When you invest or buy stock at a certain price the app automatically charges you more than the stock exchange price and then when you sell it automatically sells it for less than the exchange rate. Basically unless the stocks are tremendously there's no way to make money with the app because the small amounts that you make the app consumes has a platform fee for everything you do
