list_of_reviews.review: I invested small money, unfortunately the asked for a security fee to withdraw my money.... After this i never saw my money and they asked for a software fee....Don't step into the trap as I did, you will lose all your money! This is a scam!STAY AWAY!!!!Let's see what happens: i got this message from support....Once the Software Commission Fee of 1,183 EUR is paid, your withdrawal will be processed without any further delay.The full amount, including the Software Commission Fee and Security Tax Deposit refund and your x,xxx,xx USD, will arrive in your account within 24-48 hours.We understand that additional steps can be unexpected, but rest assured this is a standard requirement for first-time transfers to ensure the security and smooth processing of your funds. After this, you will be able to withdraw funds freely without further requirements.

First they bothered everyone for a new BS KYC thing they cooked up. Did the KYC. But THEN they continued bothering everyone and THREATENING people with account closure, even those that already have KYC, just with the little disclaimer "if you already did KYC, ignore this email".How lazy can one company be, how ignorant of the customer experience can you be to literally threaten customers with account closure if they don't do something that they have already done?

list_of_reviews.review_title: STAY AWAY! Discrimination for valid EU ID cards!
list_of_reviews.review: They refused repeatedly to validate my legal Greek ID card. Instead they ask for a passport. Their support is horrible. Moreover I got an email that they will suspend my account on 10th of September and they did it today. I have reported them to German Antidiscrimination Authority.I will not answer to any message from them as they know exactly what they do.Kraken support: Do you accept valid Greek old type ID cards or you do a discrimination by asking passports?

I am about to have a mental breakdown because of their emails to verify my account with their service provider WebID, which they take so much time to do it and most of the time it's hard to get a hold of them. Tons of emails with stressful subjects like "your account will be permanently suspended, bla bla bla..." real torture.

Abhorrent withdrawal fees, just steer away from this rip-off! Tried it with a small amount of money at lost all of it due to their minimum withdrawal limit and fees to transfer the money back to my bank account. Luckily it was just a small amount but you've been warned!EDIT:As you can see, in their response below they are saying nothing about the withdrawal transfer fees back to your bank account. Not only the fees to buy and sell crypto are high, but when you want to get your money back the real *** **** begins.

I wanted to buy 25£ worth of solana, nothing major, as I wanted to activate my Phantom Wallet.So I go to open an account, they make me wait 24 hours to deposit.After I deposit, they take a 1.24£ fee without telling me prior to me buying it, so I'm left with only 23.76£ worth of solana. Whatever, not that much but still annoying I wasn't told beforehand.Then, I'm told for "security reasons" I can't send MY assets to MY Phantom wallet for another 72 hours! I wonder what will happen after these 72 hours pass, probably make me wait another 7 years because the stars have aligned in a specific pattern!My advice: stay away if you actually want to use your cryptocurrencies productively because this company sure as hell won't let you!

Disgraceful company. Opened an account, verified with photo ID, and made an initial deposit (so I could try using the platform see if I wanted to invest more later down the line), from my bank account that is registered at the same address as on the ID.Held my faster payments deposit for 4 days, when I contact support they email me several hours later telling me they are closing my account and returning the funds to my account. No reason given whatsoever - if a bank were to close your account - they tell you why.So I'm currently waiting for the money to return to my account - they were happy to take it, lets see if they are happy to return it.Moral of the story? Use another platform.Kraken support ticket: # 13682011

list_of_reviews.review: Withdrawal fees were increased from 1 USDC per withdrawal to 2 USDC (100%). Same for spot trading fees, also multiplied 2x.Kraken is fast, sure, yet no other services were added. So why fees go up? Not fair, will switch back to Coinbase.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They took my money and now they wont answer
list_of_reviews.review: I made an account on their platform four days ago. Afterwards, I went to my bank and made a deposit. (I can provide the receipt). I received an email today indicating a successful deposit. I went on their website and purchased cryptocurrency, but it did not work when I tried to withdraw from their website. According to the statement, the transaction is currently on hold. It has been 11 hours since then. They are not responding to my email or chat support. Whenever I try to contact them on Facebook or leave a comment, they respond politely and say that our team will reach out to you shortly. I did not receive an email with an explanation from them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: DO NOT SEND YOUR FUNDS TO THESE FRAUDSTER

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account closed no guidance on personal information which is now at risk

They even advised I delete the email I received advising of the closure?Incredibly unprofessional service and now with no option available to discuss this matter I have serious concerns about my personal information they hold and how this will be treated.

I invested small money, unfortunately the asked for a security fee to withdraw my money.... After this, you will be able to withdraw funds freely without further requirements.

Seriously it's ridiculous!let's see!

Disgraceful company. Opened an account, verified with photo ID, and made an initial deposit (so I could try using the platform see if I wanted to invest more later down the line), from my bank account that is registered at the same address as on the ID.Held my faster payments deposit for 4 days, when I contact support they email me several hours later telling me they are closing my account and returning the funds to my account. No reason given whatsoever - if a bank were to close your account - they tell you why.So I'm currently waiting for the money to return to my account - they were happy to take it, lets see if they are happy to return it.Moral of the story? Use another platform.Kraken support ticket: # 13682011

list_of_reviews.review_title: Would rate at less than one if…

Lost over $230.00 in transaction fees and loss on quick liquidation of ETH. Asking for reimbursement of loss since I was forced to liquidate account without explanation. Kraken--- A rip off of time and money.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I also got screwed by Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I also got screwed by Kraken, which was my very first crypto account and trade.  I set up the account, I made 1st trade for modest test amount ($1k for me is modest). list_of_reviews.review_title: My cash deposit is still on hold…

list_of_reviews.review_title: This app literally steals your money
list_of_reviews.review: This app literally steals your money. When you invest or buy stock at a certain price the app automatically charges you more than the stock exchange price and then when you sell it automatically sells it for less than the exchange rate. Basically unless the stocks are tremendously there's no way to make money with the app because the small amounts that you make the app consumes has a platform fee for everything you do

list_of_reviews.review: Withdrawal fees were increased from 1 USDC per withdrawal to 2 USDC (100%). Same for spot trading fees, also multiplied 2x.Kraken is fast, sure, yet no other services were added. So why fees go up? Not fair, will switch back to Coinbase.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They took my money and now they wont answer
list_of_reviews.review: I made an account on their platform four days ago. Afterwards, I went to my bank and made a deposit. (I can provide the receipt). I received an email today indicating a successful deposit. I went on their website and purchased cryptocurrency, but it did not work when I tried to withdraw from their website. According to the statement, the transaction is currently on hold. It has been 11 hours since then. They are not responding to my email or chat support. Whenever I try to contact them on Facebook or leave a comment, they respond politely and say that our team will reach out to you shortly. I did not receive an email with an explanation from them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account closed no guidance on personal information which is now at risk
list_of_reviews.review: Got an email today saying account had been closed and not able to create a new one for security reasons. No mention of what actions they are taking to destroy the sensitive data they hold about me including copies of ID and bank card details. They even advised I delete the email I received advising of the closure?Incredibly unprofessional service and now with no option available to discuss this matter I have serious concerns about my personal information they hold and how this will be treated.

list_of_reviews.review_title: DO NOT SEND YOUR FUNDS TO THESE FRAUDSTER
list_of_reviews.review: After transfering money they just block my account - can't access my bitcoin, can't access my EUR - it is just locked and they always reply with an AI-generated mail with a link to their help-page.I think it is a scam. DO NOT TRANSFER YOUR FUNDS TO THESE FRAUDSTERS

First they bothered everyone for a new BS KYC thing they cooked up. Did the KYC. But THEN they continued bothering everyone and THREATENING people with account closure, even those that already have KYC, just with the little disclaimer "if you already did KYC, ignore this email".How lazy can one company be, how ignorant of the customer experience can you be to literally threaten customers with account closure if they don't do something that they have already done?

I invested small money, unfortunately the asked for a security fee to withdraw my money.... After this i never saw my money and they asked for a software fee....Don't step into the trap as I did, you will lose all your money! This is a scam!STAY AWAY!!!!Let's see what happens: i got this message from support....Once the Software Commission Fee of 1,183 EUR is paid, your withdrawal will be processed without any further delay.The full amount, including the Software Commission Fee and Security Tax Deposit refund and your x,xxx,xx USD, will arrive in your account within 24-48 hours.We understand that additional steps can be unexpected, but rest assured this is a standard requirement for first-time transfers to ensure the security and smooth processing of your funds. After this, you will be able to withdraw funds freely without further requirements.

list_of_reviews.review_title: STAY AWAY! Discrimination for valid EU ID cards!
list_of_reviews.review: They refused repeatedly to validate my legal Greek ID card. Instead they ask for a passport. Their support is horrible. Moreover I got an email that they will suspend my account on 10th of September and they did it today. I have reported them to German Antidiscrimination Authority.I will not answer to any message from them as they know exactly what they do.Kraken support: Do you accept valid Greek old type ID cards or you do a discrimination by asking passports?

Tons of emails with stressful subjects like "your account will be permanently suspended, bla bla bla..." real torture.

I wanted to buy 25£ worth of solana, nothing major, as I wanted to activate my Phantom Wallet.So I go to open an account, they make me wait 24 hours to deposit.After I deposit, they take a 1.24£ fee without telling me prior to me buying it, so I'm left with only 23.76£ worth of solana. Whatever, not that much but still annoying I wasn't told beforehand.Then, I'm told for "security reasons" I can't send MY assets to MY Phantom wallet for another 72 hours! I wonder what will happen after these 72 hours pass, probably make me wait another 7 years because the stars have aligned in a specific pattern!My advice: stay away if you actually want to use your cryptocurrencies productively because this company sure as hell won't let you!

Withdrawal fees were increased from 1 USDC per withdrawal to 2 USDC (100%). Same for spot trading fees, also multiplied 2x.Kraken is fast, sure, yet no other services were added. So why fees go up? Not fair, will switch back to Coinbase.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They took my money and now they wont answer
list_of_reviews.review: I made an account on their platform four days ago. Afterwards, I went to my bank and made a deposit. (I can provide the receipt). I received an email today indicating a successful deposit. I went on their website and purchased cryptocurrency, but it did not work when I tried to withdraw from their website. According to the statement, the transaction is currently on hold. It has been 11 hours since then. They are not responding to my email or chat support. Whenever I try to contact them on Facebook or leave a comment, they respond politely and say that our team will reach out to you shortly. I did not receive an email with an explanation from them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: DO NOT SEND YOUR FUNDS TO THESE FRAUDSTER
list_of_reviews.review: After transfering money they just block my account - can't access my bitcoin, can't access my EUR - it is just locked and they always reply with an AI-generated mail with a link to their help-page.I think it is a scam. DO NOT TRANSFER YOUR FUNDS TO THESE FRAUDSTERS

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account closed no guidance on personal information which is now at risk
list_of_reviews.review: Got an email today saying account had been closed and not able to create a new one for security reasons. No mention of what actions they are taking to destroy the sensitive data they hold about me including copies of ID and bank card details. They even advised I delete the email I received advising of the closure?Incredibly unprofessional service and now with no option available to discuss this matter I have serious concerns about my personal information they hold and how this will be treated.

list_of_reviews.review_title: STAY AWAY! Discrimination for valid EU ID cards!
list_of_reviews.review: They refused repeatedly to validate my legal Greek ID card. Instead they ask for a passport. Their support is horrible. Moreover I got an email that they will suspend my account on 10th of September and they did it today. I have reported them to German Antidiscrimination Authority.I will not answer to any message from them as they know exactly what they do.Kraken support: Do you accept valid Greek old type ID cards or you do a discrimination by asking passports?

I invested small money, unfortunately the asked for a security fee to withdraw my money.... After this i never saw my money and they asked for a software fee....Don't step into the trap as I did, you will lose all your money! This is a scam!STAY AWAY!!!!Let's see what happens: i got this message from support....Once the Software Commission Fee of 1,183 EUR is paid, your withdrawal will be processed without any further delay.The full amount, including the Software Commission Fee and Security Tax Deposit refund and your x,xxx,xx USD, will arrive in your account within 24-48 hours.We understand that additional steps can be unexpected, but rest assured this is a standard requirement for first-time transfers to ensure the security and smooth processing of your funds. After this, you will be able to withdraw funds freely without further requirements.

First they bothered everyone for a new BS KYC thing they cooked up. Did the KYC. But THEN they continued bothering everyone and THREATENING people with account closure, even those that already have KYC, just with the little disclaimer "if you already did KYC, ignore this email".How lazy can one company be, how ignorant of the customer experience can you be to literally threaten customers with account closure if they don't do something that they have already done?

I am about to have a mental breakdown because of their emails to verify my account with their service provider WebID, which they take so much time to do it and most of the time it's hard to get a hold of them. Tons of emails with stressful subjects like "your account will be permanently suspended, bla bla bla..." real torture.

Abhorrent withdrawal fees, just steer away from this rip-off! Tried it with a small amount of money at lost all of it due to their minimum withdrawal limit and fees to transfer the money back to my bank account. Luckily it was just a small amount but you've been warned!EDIT:As you can see, in their response below they are saying nothing about the withdrawal transfer fees back to your bank account. Not only the fees to buy and sell crypto are high, but when you want to get your money back the real *** **** begins.

I wanted to buy 25£ worth of solana, nothing major, as I wanted to activate my Phantom Wallet.So I go to open an account, they make me wait 24 hours to deposit.After I deposit, they take a 1.24£ fee without telling me prior to me buying it, so I'm left with only 23.76£ worth of solana. Whatever, not that much but still annoying I wasn't told beforehand.Then, I'm told for "security reasons" I can't send MY assets to MY Phantom wallet for another 72 hours! I wonder what will happen after these 72 hours pass, probably make me wait another 7 years because the stars have aligned in a specific pattern!My advice: stay away if you actually want to use your cryptocurrencies productively because this company sure as hell won't let you!

list_of_reviews.review_title: The app lacks basic features like…
list_of_reviews.review: The app lacks basic features like showing a breakdown of invested funds and return.It is such a simple update even for the stupidest programmer that I cannot help thinking that they don't want to give people the ability to see at a glance how much they invested. Seriously it's ridiculous!let's see!

Disgraceful company. Opened an account, verified with photo ID, and made an initial deposit (so I could try using the platform see if I wanted to invest more later down the line), from my bank account that is registered at the same address as on the ID.Held my faster payments deposit for 4 days, when I contact support they email me several hours later telling me they are closing my account and returning the funds to my account. No reason given whatsoever - if a bank were to close your account - they tell you why.So I'm currently waiting for the money to return to my account - they were happy to take it, lets see if they are happy to return it.Moral of the story? Use another platform.Kraken support ticket: # 13682011

list_of_reviews.review_title: I was conned and this was how they…
list_of_reviews.review: I was conned and this was how they facilitated it so stay clear of it. My stupidity also but it seem to have weak security as so many are conned through this service.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Would rate at less than one if…
list_of_reviews.review: Would rate at less than one if available.  Transferred money to Kraken brought ETH, sent 2 small tests amount to Metamask, when I went to send larger amount to Metamask  Kraken first held transaction for 24 hours then failed to send and  then told me they were closing my account without reason and I had to liquidate the account. Lost over $230.00 in transaction fees and loss on quick liquidation of ETH. Asking for reimbursement of loss since I was forced to liquidate account without explanation. Kraken--- A rip off of time and money.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Over a week for an etransfer
list_of_reviews.review: Over a week for an etransfer? This is an f ing joke The money has been taken, the screw up is on your part and your customer  service sucks

Worst ever company I used. I did a sepa bank transfer 25,000£ and the blocked my account without any further explanation and sent back 24700£ Absolute scammers don’t advise anyone to use that platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I also got screwed by Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I also got screwed by Kraken, which was my very first crypto account and trade.  I set up the account, I made 1st trade for modest test amount ($1k for me is modest).  When I went to transfer to my cold wallet, that function was blocked.  A few hours later, I got a notice to liquidate and drain the acct within 72 hours or be locked out.   No explanation.  No recourse.public id: AA87 N84G BS65 YJLQ

list_of_reviews.review_title: My cash deposit is still on hold…
list_of_reviews.review: My cash deposit was on hold to bad the chat on customer support could not solve my problem like they told me they did.After contact here my problem is solved quick and swift thanks for restoring confidence to use the platform again.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Very bad experience they are not honest…
list_of_reviews.review: Very bad experience they are not honest and take my money and refuse to return it back even after they ask me to send 100000 AED to be able to take my money I will not recommend it to any one

Even this rating is too high they deserve 0,0 or less if possible , Closed accounts without any explanation told to transfer back all funds within 72hrs not received money or any support regarding this issue. Stay as far as possible from this fraudsters. DON'T BE SCAMMED.

I put money into earn, at 7% bonded interest for 30 days. After 30 days waiting fore the assets to be freed , my money was not returned and was told by their support it had been consumed by fees. Funny thing is there isnt supposed to be fees on putting money into their earn account.Further inquiry on their chat was met with silenceThis exchange is a scam i would not return and neither should anyone else

Withdrawal fees were increased from 1 USDC per withdrawal to 2 USDC (100%). Same for spot trading fees, also multiplied 2x.Kraken is fast, sure, yet no other services were added. So why fees go up? Not fair, will switch back to Coinbase.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They took my money and now they wont answer
list_of_reviews.review: I made an account on their platform four days ago. Afterwards, I went to my bank and made a deposit. (I can provide the receipt). I received an email today indicating a successful deposit. I went on their website and purchased cryptocurrency, but it did not work when I tried to withdraw from their website. According to the statement, the transaction is currently on hold. It has been 11 hours since then. They are not responding to my email or chat support. Whenever I try to contact them on Facebook or leave a comment, they respond politely and say that our team will reach out to you shortly. I did not receive an email with an explanation from them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: DO NOT SEND YOUR FUNDS TO THESE FRAUDSTER
list_of_reviews.review: After transfering money they just block my account - can't access my bitcoin, can't access my EUR - it is just locked and they always reply with an AI-generated mail with a link to their help-page.I think it is a scam. DO NOT TRANSFER YOUR FUNDS TO THESE FRAUDSTERS

list_of_reviews.review_title: STAY AWAY! Discrimination for valid EU ID cards!
list_of_reviews.review: They refused repeatedly to validate my legal Greek ID card. Instead they ask for a passport. Their support is horrible. Moreover I got an email that they will suspend my account on 10th of September and they did it today. I have reported them to German Antidiscrimination Authority.I will not answer to any message from them as they know exactly what they do.Kraken support: Do you accept valid Greek old type ID cards or you do a discrimination by asking passports?

First they bothered everyone for a new BS KYC thing they cooked up. Did the KYC. But THEN they continued bothering everyone and THREATENING people with account closure, even those that already have KYC, just with the little disclaimer "if you already did KYC, ignore this email".How lazy can one company be, how ignorant of the customer experience can you be to literally threaten customers with account closure if they don't do something that they have already done?

I invested small money, unfortunately the asked for a security fee to withdraw my money.... After this i never saw my money and they asked for a software fee....Don't step into the trap as I did, you will lose all your money! This is a scam!STAY AWAY!!!!Let's see what happens: i got this message from support....Once the Software Commission Fee of 1,183 EUR is paid, your withdrawal will be processed without any further delay.The full amount, including the Software Commission Fee and Security Tax Deposit refund and your x,xxx,xx USD, will arrive in your account within 24-48 hours.We understand that additional steps can be unexpected, but rest assured this is a standard requirement for first-time transfers to ensure the security and smooth processing of your funds. After this, you will be able to withdraw funds freely without further requirements.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account closed no guidance on personal information which is now at risk
list_of_reviews.review: Got an email today saying account had been closed and not able to create a new one for security reasons. No mention of what actions they are taking to destroy the sensitive data they hold about me including copies of ID and bank card details. They even advised I delete the email I received advising of the closure?Incredibly unprofessional service and now with no option available to discuss this matter I have serious concerns about my personal information they hold and how this will be treated.

I wanted to buy 25£ worth of solana, nothing major, as I wanted to activate my Phantom Wallet.So I go to open an account, they make me wait 24 hours to deposit.After I deposit, they take a 1.24£ fee without telling me prior to me buying it, so I'm left with only 23.76£ worth of solana. Whatever, not that much but still annoying I wasn't told beforehand.Then, I'm told for "security reasons" I can't send MY assets to MY Phantom wallet for another 72 hours! I wonder what will happen after these 72 hours pass, probably make me wait another 7 years because the stars have aligned in a specific pattern!My advice: stay away if you actually want to use your cryptocurrencies productively because this company sure as hell won't let you!

I am about to have a mental breakdown because of their emails to verify my account with their service provider WebID, which they take so much time to do it and most of the time it's hard to get a hold of them. Tons of emails with stressful subjects like "your account will be permanently suspended, bla bla bla..." real torture.

Abhorrent withdrawal fees, just steer away from this rip-off! Tried it with a small amount of money at lost all of it due to their minimum withdrawal limit and fees to transfer the money back to my bank account. Luckily it was just a small amount but you've been warned!EDIT:As you can see, in their response below they are saying nothing about the withdrawal transfer fees back to your bank account. Not only the fees to buy and sell crypto are high, but when you want to get your money back the real *** **** begins.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Would rate at less than one if…
list_of_reviews.review: Would rate at less than one if available.  Transferred money to Kraken brought ETH, sent 2 small tests amount to Metamask, when I went to send larger amount to Metamask  Kraken first held transaction for 24 hours then failed to send and  then told me they were closing my account without reason and I had to liquidate the account. Lost over $230.00 in transaction fees and loss on quick liquidation of ETH. Asking for reimbursement of loss since I was forced to liquidate account without explanation. Kraken--- A rip off of time and money.

Disgraceful company. Opened an account, verified with photo ID, and made an initial deposit (so I could try using the platform see if I wanted to invest more later down the line), from my bank account that is registered at the same address as on the ID.Held my faster payments deposit for 4 days, when I contact support they email me several hours later telling me they are closing my account and returning the funds to my account. No reason given whatsoever - if a bank were to close your account - they tell you why.So I'm currently waiting for the money to return to my account - they were happy to take it, lets see if they are happy to return it.Moral of the story? Use another platform.Kraken support ticket: # 13682011

Seriously it's ridiculous!let's see!

Not only the fees to buy and sell crypto are high, but when you want to get your money back the real *** **** begins.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Would rate at less than one if…
list_of_reviews.review: Would rate at less than one if available.  Transferred money to Kraken brought ETH, sent 2 small tests amount to Metamask, when I went to send larger amount to Metamask  Kraken first held transaction for 24 hours then failed to send and  then told me they were closing my account without reason and I had to liquidate the account. Lost over $230.00 in transaction fees and loss on quick liquidation of ETH. Asking for reimbursement of loss since I was forced to liquidate account without explanation. Kraken--- A rip off of time and money.

list_of_reviews.review_title: several hundreds of Euros in damage

Despite providing a vast amount of personal information, the verification got repeatedly rejected without further reasoning. I called their support who could or simply do not want to resolve the issue. I can not recommend this company nor their products to anyone.

There way of dealing with it is to inform you that due to security concerns which they cant disclose, they will close your account with immediate affect and consider the matter resolved.

I called their support who could or simply do not want to resolve the issue. I can not recommend this company nor their products to anyone.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The app lacks basic features like…

list_of_reviews.review_title: They took my money and now they wont answer
list_of_reviews.review: I made an account on their platform four days ago. Afterwards, I went to my bank and made a deposit. (I can provide the receipt). I received an email today indicating a successful deposit. I went on their website and purchased cryptocurrency, but it did not work when I tried to withdraw from their website. According to the statement, the transaction is currently on hold. It has been 11 hours since then. They are not responding to my email or chat support. Whenever I try to contact them on Facebook or leave a comment, they respond politely and say that our team will reach out to you shortly. I did not receive an email with an explanation from them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: STAY AWAY! Discrimination for valid EU ID cards!
list_of_reviews.review: They refused repeatedly to validate my legal Greek ID card. Instead they ask for a passport. Their support is horrible. Moreover I got an email that they will suspend my account on 10th of September and they did it today. I have reported them to German Antidiscrimination Authority.I will not answer to any message from them as they know exactly what they do.Kraken support: Do you accept valid Greek old type ID cards or you do a discrimination by asking passports?

First they bothered everyone for a new BS KYC thing they cooked up. Did the KYC. But THEN they continued bothering everyone and THREATENING people with account closure, even those that already have KYC, just with the little disclaimer "if you already did KYC, ignore this email".How lazy can one company be, how ignorant of the customer experience can you be to literally threaten customers with account closure if they don't do something that they have already done?

list_of_reviews.review_title: DO NOT SEND YOUR FUNDS TO THESE FRAUDSTER
list_of_reviews.review: After transfering money they just block my account - can't access my bitcoin, can't access my EUR - it is just locked and they always reply with an AI-generated mail with a link to their help-page.I think it is a scam. DO NOT TRANSFER YOUR FUNDS TO THESE FRAUDSTERS

I invested small money, unfortunately the asked for a security fee to withdraw my money.... After this i never saw my money and they asked for a software fee....Don't step into the trap as I did, you will lose all your money! This is a scam!STAY AWAY!!!!Let's see what happens: i got this message from support....Once the Software Commission Fee of 1,183 EUR is paid, your withdrawal will be processed without any further delay.The full amount, including the Software Commission Fee and Security Tax Deposit refund and your x,xxx,xx USD, will arrive in your account within 24-48 hours.We understand that additional steps can be unexpected, but rest assured this is a standard requirement for first-time transfers to ensure the security and smooth processing of your funds. After this, you will be able to withdraw funds freely without further requirements.

I wanted to buy 25£ worth of solana, nothing major, as I wanted to activate my Phantom Wallet.So I go to open an account, they make me wait 24 hours to deposit.After I deposit, they take a 1.24£ fee without telling me prior to me buying it, so I'm left with only 23.76£ worth of solana. Whatever, not that much but still annoying I wasn't told beforehand.Then, I'm told for "security reasons" I can't send MY assets to MY Phantom wallet for another 72 hours! I wonder what will happen after these 72 hours pass, probably make me wait another 7 years because the stars have aligned in a specific pattern!My advice: stay away if you actually want to use your cryptocurrencies productively because this company sure as hell won't let you!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This app literally steals your money
list_of_reviews.review: This app literally steals your money. When you invest or buy stock at a certain price the app automatically charges you more than the stock exchange price and then when you sell it automatically sells it for less than the exchange rate. Basically unless the stocks are tremendously there's no way to make money with the app because the small amounts that you make the app consumes has a platform fee for everything you do

Be warned before you send your hard earned money to these people.  They do not care about their customers at all.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Twice they locked my account once…

list_of_reviews.review_title: several hundreds of Euros in damage
list_of_reviews.review: They locked my account. Luckily I was able to withdraw most of my funds in anticipation of this event, but they still have hundreds of my Euros under their control. Despite providing a vast amount of personal information, the verification got repeatedly rejected without further reasoning. Be warned before you send your hard earned money to these people.  They do not care about their customers at all.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Twice they locked my account once…
list_of_reviews.review: Twice they locked my account once because there was a mix up at my bank but the second time they locked me out for security reasons, but would give no explanation.  Then they said I had to withdraw my funds within 72 hours.  Since I don't check the email used for that account everyday, I missed the 72 hour deadline.  I had to contact them and threaten them with a lawsuit before they "temporarily" re-opened my account  so that I could make the necessary withdrawl.

Withdrawal fees were increased from 1 USDC per withdrawal to 2 USDC (100%). Same for spot trading fees, also multiplied 2x.Kraken is fast, sure, yet no other services were added. So why fees go up? Not fair, will switch back to Coinbase.

list_of_reviews.review_title: several hundreds of Euros in damage
list_of_reviews.review: They locked my account. Luckily I was able to withdraw most of my funds in anticipation of this event, but they still have hundreds of my Euros under their control. The reason they locked it is a KYC verification due to regulations in my country. I tried to get verified with various documents and a video call, which cost me hours of my time. Despite providing a vast amount of personal information, the verification got repeatedly rejected without further reasoning. I called their support who could or simply do not want to resolve the issue. I can not recommend this company nor their products to anyone.

Even this rating is too high they deserve 0,0 or less if possible , Closed accounts without any explanation told to transfer back all funds within 72hrs not received money or any support regarding this issue. Stay as far as possible from this fraudsters. DON'T BE SCAMMED.

Just be careful with these people. If you happen to have the misfortune to fall victim to a scam, dont expect any help from them. There way of dealing with it is to inform you that due to security concerns which they cant disclose, they will close your account with immediate affect and consider the matter resolved.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The app lacks basic features like…
list_of_reviews.review: The app lacks basic features like showing a breakdown of invested funds and return.It is such a simple update even for the stupidest programmer that I cannot help thinking that they don't want to give people the ability to see at a glance how much they invested. Seriously it's ridiculous!let's see!

list_of_reviews.review_title: I tried to withdraw the ETH on my…
list_of_reviews.review: I tried to withdraw the ETH on my account.  This process should only take 1 to 30 mins.  The transaction is still on hold after 18 hours.  The support team could not provide me with any answers.  They all use a script to deal with client objections.  The only thing I kept hearing from them is that someone from the Specialist Team will email me with an update.  I never received any emails from that team.  When I asked to speak to a Manager they said that was not possible and would be a total waste of my time.A total of 10 tickets were created by the Support team but I still got no response.  My level of frustration with this company and its staff is through the roof and it has created immense stress for me.I would not recommend this company to anyone.  Be warned before you send your hard earned money to these people.  They do not care about their customers at all.

Avoid this company. I am new to Crypto but decided to use this platform as i believed it was regulated and would be safe.I deposited GBP3,800 in USDT in 2 UK Bank Card transactions. After 72 hours (which was the time it took my UK bank to clear payment) they closed my account without any explanation and requested i covert coins to USD and withdraw from Kraken platform within 72 hours. The problem is that the only avenue to withdraw funds available on the platform is to use 3rd party wire however, this is only available to US Citizens, of which i am not.I received email from Kraken Support requesting a Bank Statement in order for them to make payment back to my UK account. It has been 48 hours since i provided this information and so far no feedback and my funds remain trapped in an un-usable Kraken account...........i am now getting worried... is this another scam company???Yesterday, i opened up a Dispute with my UK bank and hope this can be escalated.Update 31-Oct.......Payment method was added to the Krakan Page to allow my withdrawal in USD back to my UK bank. The transfer was completed howver, 8 hours later and funds NOT YET arrived to my bank. All bank details were correct and checked multiple times before transaction. If in fact funds do reach my UK bank account i will update further. Ticket # 14054173

Horrific!! I can’t believe I even signed up to use this exchange. I wished I had used Trustpilot and read the reviews beforehand. My account was compromised months ago where fraudsters were able to access my account and carry out fraudulent transactions on my behalf. I have been in contact numerous times with their online chat service and still have not received an email regarding my case ticket. Under no circumstances must you sign up to this exchange if you value account security and customer service. Absolutely horrendous. I’d put minus 5 stars if I could.

Been using it for a while. Few days ago I bought some Dodgecoin and the money deposited was not reflected. Contacted customer service to receive an account closure notification telling me to withdraw money within 72 hours. How can I withdraw money when they already closed my account? Contacted customer service via phone and couldn't give any proper answer. Just kept repeating that they will contact via email like a parrot. Absolute scam. I want my money back!!!!    #14027910

list_of_reviews.review_title: I am extremely disappointed with the…
list_of_reviews.review: I am extremely disappointed with the support I have received. Despite submitting Ticket #14057244 and Ticket #14036995 for a week, I have not received any response. The support team has failed to answer my calls, and there has been no communication regarding the issues with my account. This poor support is unacceptable and has caused significant inconvenience.

Extremely poor customer service - I have been following up with the Kraken team over the last 7 days.Unfortunately, I have not received any response or, confirmation from the support team.I have the records to substantiate that after the team's response on Oct 15, 2024, I have repeatedly emailed /followed up but Kraken did not respond to my emails.*EDIT: Ticket Number is # 13817931@KRAKEN SUPPORT
Run!! As soon as I made a huge deposit to trade, they closed my account denying me access to my money. They held it for 10 days. They are probably using your money to trade. I am reporting them!!
scammers, they took from 91.500 euro the exchange fee and didnt let to withrdrawl the funds!, stay away from this scammers.!

I wrote to them several times and I always get the answer that the relevant team is working on it. Sending me back my money is a task of a few minutes!I really don't know what to do, I have been waiting for 10.000 USDT for half a year now, I can't wait any longer. list_of_reviews.review_title: Do not touch with a barge poll. Worst experience ever.
list_of_reviews.review: Scam company do not use. They will let you deposit money, pay fees, and tell you they are processing your crypto. Then when you ask where is it? They will ignore you and tell you to wait and wait and wait. Then suddenly your account will be closed your account for no reason. They won't give you money. Instead they make you PAY MORE FEES to exchange the crpyto back to FIAT. Then another fee to send it back to your bank.Check out the reviews they do this A LOT. Scamming people money so they can make the buy and force them to sell and they profit 2 sets of fees. And the customer service is horrible and usless. They cannot do anything, they have no control to help over anything. They ask for your ticket to help, but they can't look or do anything! The real support just hides behind emails. What is the point in having customer service if you can't actually help customer? Wait wait wait for an email from our specialists wow so insightful. YOU HAVE TO WAIT 1 HOUR ON HOLD TO CUSTOMER SERVICE JUST TO GET TOLD THIS. It took about 18 hours in total after they froze my crypto to get an email saying they were closing my account.I asked for a refund on the £30 fees I paid since they refused to transfer my crypto. Their answer "Please note that we are unable to waive or give back the standard fees charged in our platform to use our services."I didn't use any fees or services because they refused to send my crypto and forced me to sell it so they can profit more money. My money stayed in their bank and they did nothing and want to charge you £30 for the pleasure of closing your account and do nothing. They will do you dirty and still try to scam every cent they can out of you. DO NOT USE THIS EXCHANGE. SCAM SCAM SCAM.

Hey there , still account 2fa problem , whene iwant to buy/sell or even withdraw I can’t do nothing error message shows said unable 2fa that I have from first day , I am very disappointed and sad because I trusted in your service and you don’t want to help me  iam losing money and my mental health due to this. Case #13980772

list_of_reviews.review_title: Do not use this company under any…
list_of_reviews.review: Do not use this company under any circumstances. My account was closed without a reason given, and it has taken over three weeks (and counting) for them to return my funds. Horrible experience. They refuse to offer reasonable expectations for the delay, other than to talk about internal processes and compliance.

Please fix just anything, I have 40+ e-mails back and forth with the support and I dont know how its possible to misunderstand the customer so much. Your "VIP" Support just came by to check if we have over 500k+ in Investments and after that also there was no longer any intend to help, its a nightmare.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken has huge wicks on many trading…
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken has huge wicks on many trading pairs which other major exchanges don't have. This makes stop losses almost unusable since you will stopped out on a quick wick and the price is back to normal before you have time to react.Sad to give this review since otherwise the exchange is nice to use and customer service is top notch.

Withdrawal fees were increased from 1 USDC per withdrawal to 2 USDC (100%). Same for spot trading fees, also multiplied 2x.Kraken is fast, sure, yet no other services were added. So why fees go up? Not fair, will switch back to Coinbase.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The app lacks basic features like…
list_of_reviews.review: The app lacks basic features like showing a breakdown of invested funds and return.It is such a simple update even for the stupidest programmer that I cannot help thinking that they don't want to give people the ability to see at a glance how much they invested. Seriously it's ridiculous!let's see!

list_of_reviews.review_title: My cash deposit is still on hold…
list_of_reviews.review: My cash deposit was on hold to bad the chat on customer support could not solve my problem like they told me they did.After contact here my problem is solved quick and swift thanks for restoring confidence to use the platform again.

list_of_reviews.review_title: WUT is wrong with all the 1 star reviews?
list_of_reviews.review: I admit that i was a little surprised about all the negative reviews, to be honest, to me it looks like a hate campaign.I am customer from Kraken quite some time already, and never ever have i experienced something bad, simply the honest truth.No withdrawal issues, no funds or assets suddenly missing or any negativity which i read from all these haters here.Just a solid exchange, safe with enough assets, good staking opportunities and lust but not least competent, friendly and responsive support in case of questions about anything.

Shit site !You want to make a deposit. No message, only....deposit on hold. I had an account. You get a message from support that your account will be closed. Only a message that you need to look at their website why accounts will be closed. If you want additional info, they only say, we cannot give additional information due to security. Dump this whole site !

Extremely poor customer service - I have been following up with the Kraken team over the last 15 Days.Unfortunately, I have not received any response or, confirmation from the support team.I have the records to substantiate that after the team's response on Oct 15, 2024, I have repeatedly emailed /followed up but Kraken did not respond to my emails.Ticket Number is # 13817931

No matter what you do, invest with a different crypto exchange. Kraken will not release your money and always has an excuse ready.I invested with Kraken while I was still living in Germany. Since then, I’ve become a digital nomad and am no longer tax resident in Germany. Kraken made a deal with a German tax authority and started requesting documents. I informed Kraken over 15 months ago that I had left Germany, but this information was ignored.Suddenly, my account was locked, even though Kraken had all the information they needed. Their verification does not work with a lot of banks. So I reached out to their so-called customer service, who suggested I could provide a document from my employer. I am my own employer. When I asked what kind of document I should issue for myself, I got no reasonable answer. Then they requested a document from Argentina, where I now live, with my address, a date, a stamp, and my name. Fine. I needed such a document from my university for migration authorities anyway. Yet, someone at Kraken was unable to read the date. Interesting how it’s good enough for immigration but not for Kraken.Then they asked for a document from my landlord. Another weak excuse was found to reject it—the document was in English.In the meantime, 27 emails went back and forth between Kraken and me. Kraken’s responses seemed mostly AI-generated or at least copy-paste. I even tried reaching out to the CEO on LinkedIn, as customer service seems intent on holding onto my funds. No response.On Instagram, I was promised someone with authority would address the issue. Nothing happened.

Kraken is a massive RIPOFF!!! You can't do anything without them completely gouging you with stupid fees. Avoid this scam of a trading platform... I wish I had read the truspilot reviews before attempting anything with this crap company.

This website made me sign up for Trustpilot. Worst experience using any type of service. Was waiting for my deposit to come for more than a week, only to receive an account closure notification later without any money refunded. Awful all way round, customer support, UX, just everything. I've been using other crypto services and exchanges without any issue, this platform is just disgusting.Just give me my money back at least! Request #14036487

Absolutely discussing and horrible service.Had my deposit held for 4 weeks with no explanation as of why no communication and will not return my money or release itIf not solved by the end of the month will be taking legal action the company EDIT: TICKET NUMBER 13911359

Horrific!! I can’t believe I even signed up to use this exchange. I wished I had used Trustpilot and read the reviews beforehand. My account was compromised months ago where fraudsters were able to access my account and carry out fraudulent transactions on my behalf. I have been in contact numerous times with their online chat service and still have not received an email regarding my case ticket. Under no circumstances must you sign up to this exchange if you value account security and customer service. Absolutely horrendous. I’d put minus 5 stars if I could.

Been using it for a while. Few days ago I bought some Dodgecoin and the money deposited was not reflected. Contacted customer service to receive an account closure notification telling me to withdraw money within 72 hours. How can I withdraw money when they already closed my account? Contacted customer service via phone and couldn't give any proper answer. Just kept repeating that they will contact via email like a parrot. Absolute scam. I want my money back!!!!    #14027910

Avoid this company. I am new to Crypto but decided to use this platform as i believed it was regulated and would be safe.I deposited GBP3,800 in USDT in 2 UK Bank Card transactions. After 72 hours (which was the time it took my UK bank to clear payment) they closed my account without any explanation and requested i covert coins to USD and withdraw from Kraken platform within 72 hours. The problem is that the only avenue to withdraw funds available on the platform is to use 3rd party wire however, this is only available to US Citizens, of which i am not.I received email from Kraken Support requesting a Bank Statement in order for them to make payment back to my UK account. It has been 48 hours since i provided this information and so far no feedback and my funds remain trapped in an un-usable Kraken account...........i am now getting worried... is this another scam company???Yesterday, i opened up a Dispute with my UK bank and hope this can be escalated.Update 31-Oct.......Payment method was added to the Krakan Page to allow my withdrawal in USD back to my UK bank. The transfer was completed howver, 8 hours later and funds NOT YET arrived to my bank. All bank details were correct and checked multiple times before transaction. If in fact funds do reach my UK bank account i will update further. Ticket # 14054173

The support team has failed to answer my calls, and there has been no communication regarding the issues with my account. This poor support is unacceptable and has caused significant inconvenience.

I have 2 children and financial problems at the moment and I really need this money ASAP, can anybody help me??UPDATE (05/11/2024): I still haven't received my money or any response from the relevant team!
